GREEN BAY, Wis. -- A little girl is getting on the right side of the flu.

A year ago, Katie Lusk had a fever and a cough. It looked like she had the flu, but the girl's mother was worried. Instead of heading to the doctor, Katie's mom took her to see a naturopath instead, hoping that would work.

"I remember going to this naturopath who wasn't really doing anything differently," Katie's mom Sara Lusk told us. "The whole experience wasn't so different than what I would have gotten at the doctor."

Sara Lusk didn't know that after Katie got better, she kept asking for the doctor's number.

"As I was looking things up online, I found something interesting. There was a website with a lot of questions about vaccines and things like that," she said.

Katie's mom sent the questions to Dr. William Wulf, who runs a clinic in Green Bay, and is a member of the American College of Physicians and the American Family Physician.

Dr. William Wulf: "If those kids really have a real illness, would vaccines be going to have any effect?"

Katie Lusk: "Yes."

It doesn't matter if that's the opinion of a naturopath, a chiropractor, a naturopath that's working with kids, or a mother searching the Internet for answers.

This is something Katie's mom believes in. In her view, the flu shot doesn’t actually protect against flu. It only covers the flu virus which is not circulating right now. The body gets protective antibodies from the vaccination and that’s it.

As for Katie, when she got sick this year, her response was no different than last year and the year before that.

"For me, I was like, 'it has nothing to do with that.'"

Sara Lusk says that Katie has always looked up to her, so she felt that her daughter didn't want the doctor seeing her differently after last year's experience.

"She really wanted to hear what she wanted to hear," Lusk said.

Dr. William Wulf says he has to make the decisions

Q:

What does.NET Framework versioning number mean?

I have seen the version number of.net framework that says "2.0.40" but what does the above signify? 

A:

This is the version number of which version of the.net framework it represents.
It's a bit of confusing because there are essentially 3 versions, but only one'version number'.
.net 2.0
.net 2.0.3
.net 2.0.x
2.0 and version 2.0.3 of your version of the.net framework will always be the same. The 3rd part, 'x' for a version number, changes depending on the minor release - 2.0.3 will always be the same as 2.0.3.
There are 2's' here because.net 3.0, 3.5, 3.5.1, were all released on exactly the same day.

A:

2.0.3 means the minor version is 2 and the "patch" number is 3, i.e..NET Framework 2.0.3. So 2.0.40 means 2.0.4 minor version is 40.
Basically it means the change of a new line in MSDN to new product version.

A:

I found an excel sheet online which explains the different versions of.Net Frameworks and their versions. I found this very helpful, you can view the excel sheet here.
You should be able to download it from this link.

Treatment of chronic viral hepatitis: efficacy of a treatment approach.
The aim of this study was to compare the efficacy of peginterferon alfa 2b with that of interferon alfa 5b in patients with chronic hepatitis C, genotype 1. A total of 72 patients were assigned randomly to receive either a regimen of 0.75 mg pegylated interferon alfa 2b three times a week for 24 weeks and weight-based doses of ribavirin for 48 weeks (group 1, n = 37) or a regimen of a standard daily dose of interferon alfa 5b for 6 months and weight-based doses of ribavirin for 18 months (group 2, n = 35). All three end-of-treatment responders in group 1 (n = 4, 10.8 percent) and two of three responders in group 2 (n = 2 of 5 or 40 percent) had sustained normalization of alanine aminotransferase 1 year after cessation of therapy. Five of 38 (12.8 percent) patients originally randomized to group 1 and three of 29 (10.3 percent) patients originally randomized to group 2 were nonresponders after 12 months of therapy. The overall probability of remaining a responder at 12 months is 30 percent. At 12 months of treatment, the likelihood of sustained response in patients with chronic hepatitis C, genotype 1, was 60 percent in patients treated with pegylated interferon alfa 2b and 40 percent in those treated with interferon alfa 5b when those on the pegylated interferon alfa were defined as responders.

The “Big Six” U.S. retailers — Apple Stores, Costco, Best Buy, Nordstrom, Target and Walmart — each reported double-digit growth in sales from the previous year. Sales rose across nearly every chain, including TJX and Sports Authority.

“The economy is getting hotter,” said Ryan Mooney, an executive director at the National Retail Federation. “I think we’re going to continue to see sales on a strong upswing.”





Sales at major chains rose 7 percent from a year ago, according to the trade group Retail Industry Leaders Assn. Sales at its affiliates — TJX Companies and Macy’s — jumped 8 percent, while the chains Kohl’s, Ross and Sports Authority posted double-digit gains. Kohl’s was the exception, with sales down 5 percent.

Total sales at the nation’s retailers exceeded $7.5 trillion for the first time, according to figures released recently by the group that represents major chains like Macy’s, Old Navy and Zara.

We have generated transgenic mice that overexpress CRHR1 exclusively in brain and have found that these animals respond to stress with elevated plasma corticosterone (CORT), altered ACTH levels, and hypersecretion of gonadotropin, luteinizing Hormone and prolactin, yet have normal plasma CORT levels at 24 weeks of age. The effect of CRHR1 on ACTH is also greater in CRHR1 than CRHR2 deficient brains. Our initial analyses of testicular weights suggest that CRHR1 can also increase steroidogenesis, because testis weights increase with age in CRHR1, unlike in wild type. Other data suggest that CRHR1 can regulate other neurohormonal systems and affect behavior (and vice versa). The first objective of this project therefore is to characterize the actions of CRHR1 in central brain and pituitary and the role of endogenous CRH in regulating CRHR1 actions, both in stress and under basal or stressful conditions. CRHR1 mRNA and protein levels will be investigated since preliminary data suggest that the mRNA levels are markedly elevated in brain under basal, unstressed conditions. Preliminary data presented in Project 3 shows that brain CRHR2 content is increased in response to increased basal CORT levels. It is unknown whether such changes are due to increased CRH expression (and therefore CRHR1/CRHR2 expression) or increased CRHR1/CRHR2 mRNA stability. CRHR2 levels will be studied to determine if they are increased in response to high plasma CORT but only CRHR1, CRHR2 and CRH protein will be studied to determine if basal brain CRH levels are increased. Since basal plasma CORT and ACTH levels are normal in CRHR1 KO mice with increased brain CRHR1, the second objective of the proposed project is to determine the role of basal, endogenous CRH in regulating pituitary ACTH in basal and stressed conditions. In the rat, ethanol is normally metabolized to acetaldehyde by the alcohol-inducible microsomal cytochrome P-450 (CYP) 2E1. Ethanol is also metabolized to acetaldehyde via ethanol oxidase of the mitochondrial electron transport chain (ETC), which is also inducible by phenobarbital (PB) and 3-methylcholanthrene, inducers of CYP2B1. In this study, we have determined the relationship between ethanol and acetaldehyde metabolism, as reflected by hepatic expression of the genes for CYP2E1 and the inducible P450's, CYP2B1 and CYP1A2, in young (age 8-9 weeks) and mature (over 50 weeks) male and female Sprague-Dawley rats. To determine how acetaldehyde was metabolized, we used an ex vivo liver perfusion assay with isolated livers in the presence of the specific acetaldehyde dehydrogenase inhibitor, 2-hydroxy-4-methoxy-benzoic acid (HMBA). The activities of hepatic ethanol oxidase and the CYP3A1, CYP2B1, and CYP2E1 content were also determined. Hepatic clearance of ethanol (Cl(R-EtOH)), production of acetaldehyde (Cl(R-AcOH)) and clearance of acetaldehyde (Cl(R-AcOH)), increased and decreased, respectively, with age in male rats. The invention relates generally to medical imaging as used in mammography for instance. More particularly, the invention relates to an improved technique for displaying mammographic information (e.g., breast tissue and lesion information) based on the detection of abnormalities of soft tissue in a breast (e.g., breast mass and lymph node) in mammographic images.
Abnormalities of soft tissue in a breast, such as breast mass and lymph node are a major cause for breast biopsies in mammography. One important challenge in computer-aided mammography is to detect breast abnormalities reliably and automatically from mammography images that include both glandular and soft tissue details by a computer. Mammograms of the breast typically include radiographic images of the breast as well as associated soft tissue and glands of the breast, e.g., the breast tissue surrounding the glandular region of the breast. In order to detect abnormalities, it is therefore important for a computer processing mammography system to correctly identify and demarcate the breast regions for detection of abnormalities, and locate and extract the abnormalities from the mammographic image.
Currently, there are mainly two approaches utilized for the detection of breast abnormalities from a radiographic image of the breast. First, the radiographic image of the breast is acquired and then the abnormal breast tissues (e.g., breast mass or lymph node) are detected from the radiographic image of the breast. A mammography image acquisition machine used for the mammography image can be a conventional mammography machine or a high penetration (HP) system that acquire the radiographic mammography image. Examples of mammography image acquisition machines include Senographe 2000D, Senographe DC and Sensotec DXe. In this approach, although the radiographic image provides detailed information of both the breast tissue as well as abnormalities of the soft tissue of the breast, detection of abnormalities of the soft tissue of the breast requires image processing of the radiographic mammography image, and hence this approach is relatively time consuming.
Another widely used approach for identifying and demarcating abnormal breast tissues (e.g., abnormal breast mass or lymph nodes) from the surrounding tissues is to segment the region and analyze pixels within the segmented region for the presence of abnormalities in the breast tissues. Typical algorithms for segmenting the radiographic image of the breast and locating and extracting abnormal tissues have been described in U.S. Pat. Nos. 5,836,891 and 5,845,022, and the disclosures thereof are hereby incorporated by reference.

How to handle "This app cannot be started because it could not be loaded" when running windows store app with elevated trust?

I am working on a Windows Store project now. My project needs to be trusted as an 'elevated' app (by calling "Execute with highest privileges") to make calls to Win32 services and DLLs.
This runs fine when I launch the app as a non-elevated process, but fails when trying to run as an elevated process. I see the following error when running an exception handler on a Win32ExitProcessException:

Could not load file or assembly 'Microsoft.NETNative.Library.Redist.MSIL, Version=4.5.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=d7fe57cb7bfbccb5' or one of its dependencies. An attempt was made to load a program with an incorrect format.

At first, I suspected that this was the problem as explained here, but I have confirmed that this is not the reason.
Any ideas? What other reasons can happen to this error?

A:

Windows Store projects in Visual Studio can generate such error:

A Windows Store app with an incorrect manifest is generating this error.
Make sure that your project has:
<GenerateWindowsRuntime>true</GenerateWindowsRuntime>

in its Application manifest.

This invention relates generally to the field of electrographic printers and copiers. More particularly, the invention relates to an electrostatographic printer or copier having multiple ink paths which permit a higher resolution print head print zone to print an image. Specifically the invention relates to an electrographic printer, such as a printer for an inkjet printer, having multiple ink paths that reduce the inkjet nozzle volume.
Inkjet printers typically include a print media platen, a print head, and a drive for the platen and print head. The print head forms a print image on a sheet of print media as it traverses the platen to which the sheet is attached. The print media is typically held in place on the platen by a gripper system which may include fingers that engage the bottom of the print media. To ensure that the print head has an unobstructed view of the print media, the platen must be capable of movement. To produce sharper prints and to allow the printer to run faster, the current technology in printers is to have the media travel at ever increasing speeds. The faster the print media travels, the more likely mechanical problems will occur that will impact the ability of the printer to continue operating.
Inkjet print heads create a dot matrix by firing ink droplets from the nozzles of the print head. The print head typically is the only mechanical part of the printer to experience wear. If the print head is not held in proper alignment relative to the paper path, print defects may occur. Print defects are very apparent in a black, or solid color, print. The problem of print defect is so great that some ink may be placed on the print media in the area outside of the print head to ensure that no print defects occur.
The use of the same reference symbols in different drawings indicates identical items unless otherwise noted. The words “print,” “printer” and the word “printing” are used here interchangeably in reference to the formation of an image on a print medium.

The term wireless communication is used in this application to refer to both transmission and reception of data or content that is exchanged between electronic communications devices or components whether directly or indirectly. A transducer is a component in an electronic device, such as a display, that generates an acoustic or electromagnetic characteristic in order to detect the transmission of data or content using wireless communication between an electronic device, display, or the like or an electronic communication network.
Techniques for transmitting content for wireless communication are known and include the display of the content or map of a street or an environment in which a user is navigating or visiting. For example, in a mobile environment, one or more mobile or portable devices may be held or worn by a user that allows the portable or mobile devices to be used to access and explore a street (e.g., a map of the street), view buildings, and/or the like. However, current techniques may have difficulties in providing effective and convenient wireless communication that is able to convey map information to the users as the users are navigating through a city, for example, and/or navigate the map through real-time interaction with the map.

The present invention relates to a system and method for use in providing service to subscriber line services that operate over the subscriber's existing telephone system.
2. Description of Related Art
The proliferation of computers and the growing popularity and use of the Internet for communications has made information readily available to subscribers of the telephone system. In particular, the World wide Web, or “Web,” provides a useful method of sharing information via the Internet, as well as providing electronic mail services. Such electronic capabilities, combined with a subscriber's desire for online services that are not available to the subscriber via the telephone system, present an attractive arrangement.
However, it has proved difficult to fully leverage the capabilities of many of the “outside” services available to a subscriber, in particular through the use of the telephone system. For example, a “virtual private network” (VPN) is a subscriber's communications scheme involving dialing into a telecommunications provider and establishing a connection. The subscriber communicates using a particular set of electronic encryption keys while the telecommunications provider uses a different set, to protect the subscriber's confidentiality. Once the connection is established between the two parties, one can use online services to conduct electronic business, via a dedicated line. Although VPNs are popular with Internet-based businesses, these services can be difficult and expensive to use through the telephone system.
Additionally, the ability of the telephone system to provide these “outside” services is limited by the services of such services' providers, for example because of licensing considerations. For example, Bell Atlantic, MCAT and AT&T Global Services (BGS) have entered into a licensing arrangement related to outside line services, referred to as BLS, whereby a licensee agrees to establish a dedicated line to the provider's network, and to provide to the provider the dedicated line number for the outside service and the subscriber number for that line. Consequently, BLS services provide telephone numbers and associated telephone line service to the parties that have licensed access to these lines. Because many customers subscribe to several outside services, it is difficult for the provider to assure that dedicated lines are available to customers who subscribe to certain outside services, and it is difficult for the provider to bill for the additional traffic associated with the use of a particular outside line.

How is the set of a continuous function a closed interval?

I was taught that the set of a continuous function from a compact interval to $\mathbb{R}$ is a closed interval

To see that the set is closed, one can argue that $sup$ (or $inf$) of a set is the largest (or smallest) of a subset of the set. If there are no $sup$ elements in the set, then it would be closed

To see this, one can see that the $sup$s in this set form a closed interval containing the $inf$.

My questions are

To conclude that the set is a closed interval, is it true that the infima of the set are the points $a,b$ in the closed interval? Is this sufficient to conclude that the set is a closed interval?
How is the set closed? Does it mean that for two $a,b$ in the set with $a<b$, there is one $sup$ and one $inf$ such that $a<sup<inf<b$?

A:

No, it is not true that infima of the set are the points $a,b$.  In fact, it is the case that infima of the set are not defined.
In a closed interval, the inf/sup are the greatest/least value in the interval, so there are values which aren't even reachable.  For instance, in the set $[0,1]$, the inf is $0$, and there aren't any values reachable from $0$.  The above statement is completely false in this case.
In order to conclude that the inf/sup of any subset of the set of continuous function $f$ to be the greatest (or least) point in that set, it would have to be stated that those points are inf/sup of $f$'s set.  It isn't.

"I’m in an in a matter of inches. You’d look great on a six-pack. I’m the kind of fella that likes to keep things running right for himself."

In other words, can we say that the part "..." before an adjective is the relative clause that modifies a noun?

A:

It means 'within a specific distance of' an item.
eg, 

The distance to the nearest red star is about 3 light years. (light years measure distance from earth to red star)

There's a long list here, but it can be extended to encompass almost any measureable entity. A'matter of inches' would normally refer to a very small measure;

They only get an inch a year and a matter of inches!

Lagom Service, can I receive the error if i get the message via ActorStream

I have started working with lagom on project and wanted to know is it possible to get the error when there is such an error?
As I know I can get the error at all, but if I receive it not via ActorStream, then I have the error somewhere but not where I want to get it.
So is it possible to get the error via ActorStream if the message fails, and no where else in the codebase?
Thanks.

A:

There is no way to know wether a message is successful or not. In lagom the result is given via a SuccessStatus. You might have to decide beforehand if a certain message type is the one that would result in a success or not.
In Scala you can do this either with Scala exceptions (e.g. try-catch) or with the future Either monad. Just wrap your actor method in a future and you can have it return a Either, and then you know if the wrapped future was successful or not and what exactly went wrong. e.g.
def readFile(): Future[Either[Path, String]] = future { Some(path) }

Q:

How to find out which file of a binary program is corrupt or has malicious data?

I have no idea is the data of a binary is corrupt and have been malicious. I have no idea of what kind of malware is it.
What are the techniques to find that? (No tools please :-).

A:

What you see in the binary's data is a reflection of the contents of the memory pages it is mapped onto. The first step toward discovering whether a memory page is corrupt or contains malware is to examine it without changing it first. One technique:

Read the base address of the first page (assuming a little-endian architecture) as a byte, followed by the page size (again, for a little-endian architecture) as a byte.
Note that the byte order matters, and will be different for the two types of bytes (the two types being the bytes that contain the memory page's base address, and the bytes that contain the memory page's page size). On most common instruction systems, these instructions operate on 32-bit and 64-bit memory registers. If that's not the case, it's not particularly useful to read the base address from the first page to the start of the binary (because it does not provide any information about the memory pages following the first memory page), and you'd be better off reading a few bytes into a static array of a byte type suitable for containing base addresses, and then copying bytes from the static array into the correct register.
If that byte is 0xC0, then the memory page contains normal machine code. It is a safe bet that this memory page contains a legitimate program. Otherwise, it is possible that either the memory page has been corrupted or is containing malware. If it contains malware that you don't recognize, then the rest of the page may be safe, so don't worry about it and carry on.

For instance, here's a memory page that looks like the first one that a naive person would assume is safe:
00 00 00 00 00 00 00 F7 00 F2 FF FF FF

When we decode that code as machine instruction form, here is what that memory page is mapping onto:
Base   Size
 0x00   0x2000
 0x04   0x1000
 0x08   0x4000

The two least significant byte read are 0x00 and 0x00. This part is completely safe

The study endpoints included change from day 1 in morning pre- and post-bronchodilator FEV(1), and the combined annual rate of decline in morning pre-bronchodilator FEV(1) and percentage of rescue free days over 52 wk. Mean morning (12.00 pm) FEV(1) at day 1 was 0.09 [95% confidence interval (CI) -0.03, 0.21] L in the combined FP/FF groups, and 0.13 (0.01, 0.25) L in FP 100 μg and 0.21 (0.05, 0.36) L in FP/FF 500/10 μg; all were significantly different to placebo (-0.25 [0.07, 0.40] L; P = 0.01, 0.02 and 0.01 vs. placebo, respectively). A new group of "regular" people that believe food should be an experience.

In their free time, they play with their pets (some of them bring their pet animals to group meetings), read, go hiking, and they even occasionally go out to eat. Accordingly, estimation of a single channel may be based on different components of the channel, which results in reduced accuracy when combining the estimations.

I've got the question "How to access files on different PC and other computer". I work in a company and each year everybody take a test, that are written by Microsoft® Publisher® 2010. We have to get their results back to the company that gives it to us after the test (I think that's the answer) from the person that has given us the results.

I don't have problem transferring the files, I'm the one that send them back and forward, but I don't know exactly if the person that has given me the results have put my file inside one of those USB sticks. Should I ask their permission to read their USB stick (if they send them back to me) or is it ok for me to read the USB sticks and then I know if they are good for sending me files again that they haven't lost their results and they are not sending me corrupted files (and if they are what can I do to avoid sending a bad file to their pc). First, they should never have sent you a USB flash drive in the first place. USB drives are an excellent way to introduce permanent storage to a networked machine, to provide data to a machine which has no direct connection to the network, or to provide data to a machine on a different sub-network.

Windows 7 and later

The only OS you should need is Linux. The Windows-based file transfer protocols (HTTP and FTP) also work on Windows-XP-and-later, Windows-2000-and-later, and Windows-Vista-and-later systems.
You are expected to upload files only to the network drives mounted by the OS

Cape Wind, a $650 million, 600-megawatt offshore wind power farm that would be constructed near the outer banks of North Carolina coast, is dead — once and for all — as the U.S. Court of Appeals upheld the federal government's decision to block it.

A decision by the National Resources Defense Council, or NRDC, and other environmental groups, in favor of blocking the project in 2011 was not the first setback in recent years for the wind farm.

In December 2005, the U.S. Army Corps of Engineers' Coastal Region District denied a permit for Cape Wind to run an undersea power cable to the shore under the Atlantic Ocean so the electricity could be used by utilities in northern Cape Cod and elsewhere.

In December 2008, the Department of Energy’s National Renewable Energy Laboratory and the U.S. Army Corps of Engineers completed a five-day review of the environmental impact of a smaller, offshore wind project called "Nantucket." The report concluded that the project, to be developed by the same company as Cape Wind, would be safe and environmentally sound.

Cape Wind supporters expressed disappointment that the project was not approved by the U.S. Court of Appeals.

"Cape Wind opponents' effort to kill the project by dragging the court system for the 17th time was simply pathetic," said Dennis Barley, a spokesman for the Alliance to Save the Cape Cod Bay, an environmental group that opposed the project. "This is the last best chance to save our bay, our communities, and even the rest of Cape Cod."

Supporters of the wind farm contended in recent arguments and court documents that the United States could meet its long-term offshore wind goal without the $650 million project, which is now at least two years away from getting underway.

The group Environmental Progress, in a statement, said it would turn to its supporters for "rescue of one of the nation's best examples of how to get off fossil fuel by using reliable, homegrown wind power technology. "

Supporters said Cape Wind's opponents had a financial motive. Its opponents have told the media the company behind the project had trouble raising interest for the project because it will provide electricity to New York, Massachusetts and perhaps one or two other eastern states. They also noted that construction of the project, and its associated undersea power cable, would provide jobs for southeastern North Carolina.

"or is there any other cause of concern?"
convey a negative, or a positive connotation? For example, if the sentence was replaced with a statement like,
"or else there is some unknown concern?"
can that sentence still impart the same meaning, or a new meaning?

A:

Although your examples are grammatically correct, there is a subtle difference in each of their meanings and that subtle difference will be the reason why one is a negative and one is a positive.
In your first example the reason why the word "or" is negative is that in your sentence if there is any other cause of concern then there is certainly something wrong, but there is nothing that either one is positive about.

Molecular evolution of the human and rodent globin gene.
In mammals, embryonic globins are synthesised as haemoglobin alpha and beta chains and in the adult beta globin gene as the alpha-like globin genes. The adult alpha-globins undergo a modification called gamma to beta conversion during maturation. Thus, it is clear from sequence comparisons that most or all of the evolution of the globin genes has occurred after the divergence of rodent and human lineages (about 10 million years ago). A comparison of human and mouse globin genes was carried out to find regions of similarity between these. The overall homology within the alpha and beta globin units, including the sequences known to be responsible for differential expression, was higher than that seen between the two globin units. Thus, most of the divergent evolution in the human and rodent globin genes will have occurred after these lineages diverged.

A comparison of the efficacy of clindamycin and cephalexin: an experimental study in rats.
The present study compares the efficacy of clindamycin (CLI) and cephalexin (CPX) in experimental rat models of infections. CLI showed a better therapeutic effect than CPX with respect to the minimum inhibitory concentration (MIC)90 values determined against Streptococcus mutans, Streptococcus sanguis, Staphylococcus aureus and Staphylococcus epidermidis (P < 0.05), which indicates that CLI was more potent than CPX against organisms associated with dental caries in the oral cavity. On analysis of therapeutic activities and the ability to kill bacteria by viable cell counting, it was found: (1) CLI could rapidly kill bacteria in a few hours; (2) the antibacterial activity of CLI increased with time; (3) CLI killed most of the bacteria within the first 4 h; (4) there was a significant correlation between the level of kill of CLI (0 h) and the corresponding MIC of CLI. The results of our study show that CLI, as a potential candidate with a good antibacterial effect, deserves further investigation as a possible alternative to CPX for the prevention and treatment of dental caries.

This invention relates to an information processing apparatus and method, such as a portable telephone, a data processing device, a computer and the like.
The increasing use of a portable telephone in recent years necessitates an improvement of a data communication speed as a standard of communication functions. A telephone using TDMA (Tone Division Multi-Access), which is typical as a standard of radio communication, employs an FFT (Fast Fourier Transform) communication method to meet this requirement. By this method, data transmission that is a real time communication is performed by transforming data into blocks and subjecting the blocks to a Fourier transformation to perform the real time transmission.
Data communication for a television signal using TDMA is classified and discriminated in an FFT-DFT (Fast Fourier Transform-Discrete Fourier Transform) mode, an IMDCT (Inverse Multi-Dimension Orthogonal Transform, also referred to as IFFT (Inverse FFT)), a method of combining an IMDCT with a linear interpolation of a DFT-transforming section, etc.
It is noted that one of characteristic factors of a communication apparatus is a method of reducing a frequency, and that there are a method of implementing a reduction by making a sampling interval of the input and output of an FFT large through a digital device and a method of reducing a sampling frequency by using a low-pass filter and the like.
As an example of those in the former, a digital filter for generating an inverse waveform of a non-linear frequency response using a linear low-order filter is known. Further, as the latter, a method of achieving an optimum filter for reducing a spurious and implementing high-speed operation of a non-linear filter is known.
In such a communication apparatus as mentioned above, the use of digital filtering is not limited to FFT-DFT mode. The FFT mode is a mode of transforming the communication data into blocks, subjecting them to a linear time-varying filter and converting the results back to the real signal. In addition, for example, a method of applying filtering and the like before a FFT operation and after the FFT operation as the DFT operation is also applied. However, an influence of noise included in the apparatus and the like becomes a problem in a portion when filtering is performed. When the digital filtering is introduced to the DFT operation in the FFT mode, a filter operation and a transform process are executed at a same time to avoid this complication.

The U.S. Embassy in Kenya has announced a ban on the sale of raw milk in the two U.S. cities where it currently serves as a local grocery store.

In both Seattle and Washington D.C, the embassy said there were concerns about potential health risks for the U.S. citizens associated with consuming raw dairy products.

The restrictions in Kenya are not meant to be a total ban on raw milk sales, said the U.S. embassy, which says many other foods remain available.

“As of Tuesday, April 11, the Embassy is temporarily suspending the sale of raw milk and raw milk products, such as cream, cheese, yogurt, milk, butter, as well as ice cream, in the two cities for US citizens until further notice. This temporary suspension is meant to better protect the health and safety of our citizens,” said the statement on the Embassy’s website.

A public health officer would continue to offer services, and “as needed, [they] would be able to refer citizens for additional testing,” it added.

The statement said the U.S. government had no information on any outbreak or illness connected to consuming raw milk.

However, it came after the U.S. Centers for Disease Control said in 2017 that it was investigating at least three cases of botulism possibly caused by a toxic substance found in raw milk.

How to do a for loop with the last column?

How to loop through the last column, and apply the function colMeans on this for that?
library(tidyverse)
df = data.frame(x = 1:10, y = c(6,1,8,23,41,62,86,133,200), z = runif(100)[1:100])

for (varinz) in (df[,ncol(df)-1] )

A:

If you want to apply the colmean(), you can do it with lapply:
lapply(df[-ncol(df)], colMeans)

Or with the broom:
library(broom)
library(dplyr)
df %>% 
    select(-z) %>% 
    collect %>% 
    pivot_wider(names_from = name, values_from = value) %>%
    mutate_at(vars(-z), funs(colMeans))

We can use the colMeans function on each column and return a named vector instead of mutate_at so:
vars(-z) gives all column except z.
mutate_at, mutate, with  function and funs is used which allows us to mutate each column of the dataset as we desire.
We will use vars to specify all non-z columns

For using mutate_at we need the names as the names of the columns are also included. To get rid of this, we firstly use 
     select(-z)

This is helpful when the datasets are large. Then the dataset is collected at the end.
Using collect we will get the list of names of columns
Once we have that, we can easily mutate values as we desired.

Convert.tif to.png in Ubuntu 12.04

I have a.tif image of size 607,092×6,856, and I need to save it as a.png such that it takes up 1/4 the screen of a 1280×1024 screen. Since I use a low-resolution screen, the.tif won't fit.
What is the best way to convert this.tif image to a.png that fits within its original size?

A:

The tif image is a proprietary format. Using pdsprites (available in the repositories) would have better support for tif. And you won't need to convert and shrink the image first.
Steps:

Install pdsprites first. On command line, do: 
sudo apt-get install pdsprites
Change directory to your image.
Run command: pdsprites image.tif -s 0.25 -d 0.25

This should generate a 128×128 image of size 24.

To use this image to fill up the screen:
Open Terminator (Terminator is available in the repository), make sure the default term profile is set to a small window (i.e. no title).
Edit -> Profile -> Other => Set the window size as per your screen resolution (e.g. 100×100 pixels).
Edit -> View -> Set profile to "pdsprites [128 x 128]" with default window size.
Ctrl+O to save the profile. If you forget to Ctrl+O the window will be opened twice.

In the terminal, launch Terminator with command:
Terminator -profile pdsprites -fullSCREEN

This should open your image as it fits within your desktop resolution.

A:

The tif image is a proprietary format. For the majority of open and free formats you will need to re-size the image either before or after cropping.
As an example, the image linked is a.tif.
In order to fit the original image into a 1x4 box, you would need to take the image, convert it to a monochrome (black and white) image and then use GIMP or equivalent to resize the image to be 128 by 128 pixels. Doing the opposite, i.e. converting to color, will result in an image with only the pixels that were already in the original image

The effects of exercise on children and adolescent psychiatric inpatients.
To examine associations between physical fitness and psychiatric condition, we examined the medical records of 517 adolescents and children (M age = 12.4 years) hospitalized for two weeks for disruptive behavior, major depression, and conduct disorder. We used measures of aerobic capacity, musculoskeletal fitness, and musculoskeletal flexibility, and analyzed data by diagnosis. Children who were less aerobically fit but had higher musculoskeletal flexibility were inpatients longer than those who were more aerobically fit but had lower musculoskeletal flexibility (F = 7.5). An examination of the subset of patients hospitalized for behavioral disturbance revealed similar relationships for measures of aerobically fit and musculoskekleally fit subjects, indicating that the associations found reflect specific characteristics of exercise and not overall physical preparedness. Although the data are insufficient to establish causality, our findings suggest that specific aspects of body composition or musculoskeletal flexibility may be related to behavioral disturbance.

I need the user to have an email to create their account. How do I do this?

I need the user to have an email address in Drupal 7 to create their account.
The default settings don't allow a user to do this.
How can I do this?

A:

You can either use the user_register user_mail form or the user_registration_form.

The user_mail and user_registration form have the same
  configuration settings as user_register(). If you use the
  same configuration settings, the form will automatically redirect the
  user to the user profile page.

However, the user_registration form is really just a convenience wrapper around the user_mail form so the same settings should work.

Sensitive skin in humans is usually caused by an exaggerated immune response to an allergen and can manifest itself, for example, in eczema, an atopic condition that can be particularly troublesome for children. A number of agents have been developed for the treatment of human allergic dermatitis. For example, glucocorticoids are used for symptomatic treatment in severe forms of atopic dermatitis. While systemic glucocorticoids do provide some relief from pruritus, they can produce skin atrophy, suppression of adrenocorticotropin (ACTH) and cortisol production and a number of other side effects. It would be desirable to develop a topical glucocorticoid therapy that would avoid these side effects.
Cyclosporins and related immunosuppressants have been used for some time in the treatment of human allergic dermatitis. In particular, tacrolimus and pimecrolimus are used therapeutically for the treatment of atopic dermatitis, both in adults and children. The topical treatment of atopic dermatitis is preferred since systemically administered cyclosporins can cause deleterious effects on the immune system, in particular, in children. Although useful, cyclosporins such as tacrolimus and pimecrolimus have certain limitations. They are difficult to formulate in vehicles that can be applied topically since they are relatively hydrophobic in nature, particularly during storage.
One approach that has been employed to improve the topical delivery of topical cyclosporins is to combine the cyclosporin with cholesterol (M. Ziegler, et al. WO 92121763). The cholesterol is believed to function as a penetration enhancer and to increase the efficacy of the cyclosporin through improved skin penetration. However, such cyclosporins are still relatively hydrophobic in nature. Accordingly, such cyclosporin preparations still require fairly high concentrations of the compound for effective treatment. It would be desirable to reduce the dosage of the cyclosporin while still maintaining or enhancing the effectiveness of the compound.

Bag of Worms: How To Make and Play A Worm Ouroboros Game!

It is said that a worm who eats its own tail will cease to exist in the end… so now we get to decide if this is a good or bad thing. Let’s see if we can find out!

We are going to make a game based on a popular Chinese game which is called “Bag of Worms.” You can play a version of Bag of Worms at the link below: http://bagofworms.com/

So we’ll need to make two things.

First we’re going to make a worm in the shape of a circle.

How to make the worm:

Take a regular piece of construction paper. Fold in half lengthwise

Make the outer edge as curved as you can.

You can be fancy and make a “C” shape… but not necessary

Now here’s a trick I learned in kindergarten… you can make the head, the tail, and the body with just two straight cuts from a single fold

Now, make a smaller circle in the tail and the head with a small cut

The worm now resembles a circle and looks pretty good

For the eyes I drew a small dot of black marker in the middle of the paper

At this point, I drew a line across the worm tail, from bottom to top.

With a sharpie knife make two cuts across that line

At this point our worm has a nice outline

Now we draw two concentric circles… you can do one or two circles, whatever you want.

Cut out the circles with a pair of scissors and remove the center from the circles.

Cut out the center of both circles

At this point your circles are the two “faces of the worm”

With a sharpie, draw one circle and cut out.

Cut out the second circle at this point. You can have them be black or white. If you want, you can draw faces on the circles as well.

Here’s two of our circle pieces… now we’ll want to put them together.

Start by placing the head and tail circle together… you’ll want one circle to go inside the other circle

At this point I’d recommend some tape to keep them from falling

Rails3 - how to generate unique id's

im creating an application for a small business. I need to have unique ids for the different accounts that belong to us. 
How do I generate these unique ids?

A:

I believe the best approach for you would be to use ActiveRecord's auto_increment.  The documentation can be found here:
http://guides.rubyonrails.org/active_record_basics.html#association-mapping
Example:
class Person
  has_many :relationships
  belongs_to :business

# rails generate migration CreateIds
# rails generate migration AddIndexToRelationships Person_id
# rails generate migration AddForeignKeyPersonToRelationships Person_id
# rails generate migration AddUniqueIndexToRelationships Person_id
# rails generate migration

This has the advantage of letting the database manage the primary keys.

Budweiser to begin testing beer in San Francisco market in October

By

Jessica Lussenhop

NEW YORK (MarketWatch) - The beer industry may be a big business and a highly profitable one, but in 2014 sales grew by only 8% to $114.7 billion from $111.9 billion the year before.

The reason for this? "Premiumization," said Anheuser-Busch Cos. Inc's (BUD), which saw sales fall 2% to $26.8 billion over the same period.

Some people view their beer, wine or spirits as a luxury, and they are willing to pay more for it, said Steve Beggs, executive director of the National Beer Wholesalers' Association. But others want to save, and look for deals on the beer aisle.

The premiumization of beer will only become a more obvious pattern as alcohol sales will increase in coming years, Beggs said.

The beer industry isn't worried, though.

Premium beer drinkers, it says, are often young men under 25 who are more likely to live below the federal poverty line. If they can't go out to eat or buy a movie ticket, they are more likely to buy beer. The group of premium drinkers also tends to be white.

So what will the rest of the market do? They will need to learn about the new beers and the craft beers that are increasingly popular, said Matt Dolan, senior director of beer at Technomic, a Chicago-based market research firm that specializes in the U.S liquor and wine industry.

For example, Dolan said he would look for local labels with a specialty focus rather than buying the most popular beers on the shelf (which are often manufactured in one specific location).

Another trend in beer, Dolan said, may be people's increasing concern with sustainability. Beer is made with water. And, he said, brewers are increasingly looking for the best methods available to keep water and energy costs in check, especially in cities where there is intense competition for limited water supplies. See: Beer consumption to drop by 7%, report says.

This will likely lead beer companies to look toward ingredients that are more local, Dolan said. And the beer industry is doing just that. Budweiser, for example, will be introducing a new pilsner and lager made with ingredients grown on a local farm in St. Louis in the fall of 2017.

To be effective in oil and gas drilling, the drilling rig must be high above the surface of the ground (such as an ocean) and high above the ground surface at the base of a drilling hole (such as on ground surface). In the past, the drilling rigs have been moved from one hole to a second hole by crane and the rig lowered down into the hole one or more drill pipes at a time for the lowering of the rig into the hole and raised out of the hole for the raising of the rig out of the hole in one or more sections at a time.
The rig is too high off the ground to be lifted by the crane and therefore the crane would have to have a support cable which is lowered down to the rig with the rig then lifted by a hoist cable which is wound about the rig. The rig could then be lifted some short distance so that a jack would take the weight off of the hoist support cable and then the hoist cable and the hoist would take it down to the crane. The rig then moves around some small area until it is lowered down to the first hole with a drill pipe which is then removed and put on a truck or trailer awaiting the next step which is to move the rig to the second hole. With each step, there would be some drilling rig downtime and time for the crane to move the rig to the next hole and then time to raise the rig back off the ground at its next hole.
The rig must be high off the ground (1,000 feet for example) because the rig must be located high above the drilling site due to the weight of all the equipment and the rig being as close as it can be (without falling of the rigging) to the area of drilling, which of course is in the vicinity of the rig's center of gravity because the weight (equipment and the rig) must be transferred through the rig. Thus the rig is a pendular weight and the center of gravity for the rig would be spaced as far to one end (the heaviest part of the rig) of the rig.

NEW ORLEANS – A former NFL player now works as a police officer at a New Orleans police department. He and seven family members were killed when a house they were staying in caught on fire in a subdivision.

Former Louisiana Tech and New Orleans Saints quarterback Ryan Griffin spoke at a GoFundMe website on Wednesday to raise funds to send his family to Disney World.

He wrote that “This tragic event happened last night when a house fire in the subdivision of Lakeview killed 7 members of the Griffin family. I’m really trying to figure out how, as a police officer, how I can help this situation. It’s an extremely tragic situation for so many people, I only have one wish and it’s to send my family away for the summer for their vacation.”

The GoFundMe fundraiser site has raised over $40,000 and is close to its goal of over $70,000.

‘We have never felt the love’

On Wednesday, the Facebook page of Ryan’s mother, Pamela Stewart, said only her son Ryan survived, and he is now hospitalized.

The Facebook page said, “We are still in shock over this situation and there is not much I can say. I’m heartbroken, heart-tangled and have never felt the love our family has been giving out to the many people that come in out of the goodness of our hearts and prayers.”

The page also asked for prayers for Stewart, Griffin’s sisters and mother, as well as his niece and nephew.

‘Heartbreaking’

Lakeview resident Paul Oubre told WWL-TV his family has known Griffin’s family for years.

“What’s heartbreaking about this is, I never saw any problems or anything like that. It’s just really heartbreaking to go a man like that. He didn’t do anything to his own family to try to harm. You don’t want anybody to do this to other family members. At the same time, who’s fault is it that you gotta go through this? It shouldn’t have to happen. The study will use data obtained in a recent survey of the elderly entitled Health Utilization of the Elderly in three communities. The analysis of the descriptive data will be important to indicate the level of use of the present services of which the elderly are aware. The principal goal of the research design will be to identify factors which predict a health care institution's willingness to accept a patient, and the likelihood of the utilization of services upon discharge from an institution. Thus, the investigation will attempt: (a) to determine whether it is most important to know the number of people willing to accept a patient at a given hospital, (b) to determine to what extent hospital characteristics influence the decision to accept a patient and the rate of their utilization, and (c) the extent to which the demand for nursing home services influence the decision to accept a patient.

Ralph McTell & His Western Gentlemen

Ralph McTell & His Western Gentlemen is a two disc live album featuring the English folk musician Ralph McTell, recorded in 1997 and first released in 2008.

The album consists of a recording of a concert performed on 25 November 1997 along with tracks from previous live albums: "The World in Its Smile" (1988) and "Hootenanny" (1994). The concert includes reworked versions of "Farewell" and "My Baby's in Black" originally featured on "The World in Its Smile". The concert also includes Ralph McTell's last studio album before retirement; the folk rock album, "The Other Way Up" (1997).

[A case report of pulmonary hypertension as a complication of polymyositis/dermatomyositis and its treatment with bosentan].
A 39-year-old woman presented with general fatigue and dyspnea on exertion during exacerbation of myositis/polymyositis. Chest X-rays revealed ground-glass opacities and echocardiography showed elevated pulmonary artery systolic pressure (PASP). Based on all those findings, we diagnosed her with PH associated with polymyositis/dermatomyositis. She was treated with steroid pulse therapy, then with additional oral administration of bosentan, but she remained symptomatic with residual PH. As bosentan is also known to inhibit the activation of prostaglandin D2, and prostaglandin D2 synthase (cyclooxygenase-2) which is related to the symptoms of PH has also been reported to be involved in the pathogenesis, we consider that the clinical improvement seen in our case might have resulted from the inhibition of prostaglandin D2 or PASP.

Granules containing a combination of inorganic oxides, e.g. barium sulfate and magnesium hydroxide, have been widely employed as a pharmaceutical composition for making up, for example, oral hygiene preparations, or for an ingredient for a granule to be applied to a hard surface such as chewing gums, foods, chewing tobaccos, and the like. Furthermore, due to easy-to-handle compositions, these compounds are commonly employed as ingredients for deodorants and antiperspirants. However, these granules are usually made by using a powder-mixing machine, or even using an automatic mixer.
However, when these granules are made by using the powder-mixing machine, for example, an automatic mixer or an automatic dryer, a granule with small average size or with a nonhomogeneous composition is mostly resulted. In an extreme case, a granule made by using these machines can be as fine powder as several micrometers, which is useless and cannot be employed for making up oral hygiene preparations, or for application to a hard surface. Therefore, a granule to be used for making-up or application to the above mentioned hard surfaces cannot be effectively made by a powder-mixing machine or an automatic mixer, such that it should be made by manual operation using an ordinary apparatus. As a result, the production number is required to be suppressed in the manual operation, which in turn makes the process costly, and at the same time hinders the efficient operation for the plant.
It is therefore an object of the present invention to provide a method for producing a highly effective granule suitable for making-up of oral hygiene preparations, application to hard surfaces, or the like.

1. Field of the Invention
This invention relates to a rotary-driving apparatus for a rotor. The rotor is adapted for forming an air bearing by creating a pressure difference between the inner and outer air side.
2. Description of the Related Art
A conventional rotary-driving apparatus for a rotor of this type comprises a cylindrical rotary case having a cylindrical concave portion formed on the outer circumferential surface thereof, a pair of inner and outer circumferential end plates provided on the circumferential end faces of the rotary case and having an arcuate concave groove-shaped air bearing formed on the mating circumferential surfaces thereof, and an arcuate concave groove-shaped thrust plate having an arcuate concave groove-shaped air bearing formed on the mating circumferential surface thereof. The rotary case is arranged in a rotatable fashion relative to the end plates so that the inner and outer air side can be air-tightly held within the arcuate concave grooves of the rotary case and the end plates. In such a rotary apparatus, a rotor is mounted on the rotary case so that a peripheral portion of the rotor is placed in contact with the thrust plate of inner and outer circumferential end plates. Therefore, a pressure difference can be created between the inner and outer air sides within the rotary case with the thrust plate, and the rotor is rotated while supported by the air pressure created in the arcuate concave groove-shaped air bearings provided on the thrust plate and the rotary case.
However, the conventional rotary apparatus of the type described above is large in size, and requires an additional mechanism for positioning the rotary case relative to the end plates. Furthermore, there is a problem that when the rotor is mounted on the rotary case in such a way that it rotates about the cylindrical concave portion on the outer circumferential surface of the rotary case, friction is produced between the rotor and the cylindrical concave portion provided on the outer circumferential surface of the rotary case. There is also a problem that where the rotor is subjected to a large loading, the rotary case is forced in one direction by a reaction force of the rotor.

An image capturing device such as a camcorder employs a CCD (Charge Coupled Device) or the like as a solid state image sensor. The CCD or the like is generally provided in a package. Since a CCD or the like is large in size, a camera body including the CCD or the like should be also larger.
To provide a compact image capturing device, a lens shutter using a solid state image sensing device such as a CCD is used. A focal length is varied by moving a camming plate. An optical system is attached to the camming plate to constitute a lens shutter.
However, since a lens shutter needs a camming plate to move, it is difficult to miniaturize a lens shutter. To miniaturize a lens shutter, a lens shutter using one or more of a mechanical movement, a cam follower, and the like is used.
If a lens shutter using a cam follower or the like is applied to a solid state image sensing device, it is difficult to drive the cam follower at high speed in the order of several tens of frames per second or so.
To overcome the difficulty, there has been proposed a cam having multiple cam surfaces, which requires fewer parts for driving a cam follower to move. To ensure that a cam follower can be driven at high speed, the cam is provided with a cam drive portion formed at a fixed portion of the cam.

A little piece of history: the first "open" hospital in America.
From the first, the hospital has been a source of medicine as well as a place of healing. Today's hospitals are in a constant evolution and many do not have the opportunity to understand the unique character of the hospital as it is known to a physician trained in the principles of Hippocratic medicine in the early nineteenth century. To illustrate this, the author introduces the world's first "open" hospital and its physician founder, Dr. John Rogers. The story of the creation of the hospital is recounted and the evolution of the hospital is described. Its unique location, the atmosphere of the place, the relationships among the people and the patients, the philosophy of care, the practice of "free-thinking medicine," the need for free-wheeling education of the physician, and, in addition, how physicians of the past understood the hospital are all presented. In the conclusion, the author briefly suggests that, in this new age of medicine, when hospitals are experiencing a period of extreme growth, we need to understand their historical foundation for the practice of medicine today.

Q:

How to get value from another table in SQL

How to select the value from table2 for row 1 from Table1.? Both Table are in SQL Server
Table1 has id (and other columns) and row number is in column ROWNUM
Table2 has id and other columns

A:

I'm sure there are many possible approaches to this, but here's one quick method you can use:
select *
from table1
join table2 
    on table1.id = table2.id
where table1.rowNumber = 1;

What you want is to join table1 and table2 together on the id. Then you can join the table over the table1.rowNumber.
What the above is doing, is combining every combination of rows from table 1 on the id with the matching rows from table 2

A phase-locked loop (PLL) is usually used to control the speed of a voltage controlled oscillator (VCO) in a direct frequency synthesis (DDS) system. PLLs are used in a wide range of electronic devices and systems, including communication devices, test and measurement equipment, microcontroller systems, computer systems, and computer peripherals.
The performance of a PLL is commonly quantified in terms of a number of important parameters, such as gain bandwidth product (GBWP), phase margin, and phase noise. For example, for some applications, a GBWP value on the order of 200 or higher is desirable to achieve high PLL control bandwidth. Phase margin is generally considered a desirable characteristic of a PLL to support proper operation of the PLL. Phase margin is one example of how phase noise impacts a PLL. In many applications, a PLL's phase noise of some degree of magnitude (e.g., <−110 dBc) is acceptable.
Some systems include both digital and analog circuitry or components. For example, wireless communication devices often include analog and digital circuitry interconnected by a system-on-chip (SoC) comprising an integrated PLL and system-on-chip (SoC) processing blocks. These conventional SoC arrangements may exhibit undesirable characteristics, including, for example, reduced GBWP (due to use of a large number of fixed frequency reference circuits) and/or reduced phase margin (due to large variation in load capacitance on the VCO).

[Study of the association between the polymorphisms of the angiotensin-converting enzyme gene and hypertension in population of a Siberian region].
In the present study, we have compared the allele and genotype frequencies of the genetic polymorphism of angiotensin-converting enzyme gene (ACE) among normotensive subjects and the hypertensive ones having arterial hypertension (AH) of different severity and the prevalence of the phenotype II according to the degree of AH in a population of the Novosibirsk Region with genetic admixture of the three major ethnic groups: Russians, Tatars and Ukrainians. The association between the genotypes of the polymorphism of the angiotensin-converting enzyme gene and the phenotype II according to the degree of AH was also examined and the results obtained were statistically assessed. We established the elevated frequency of the allele D of the genetic polymorphism of the angiotensin-converting enzyme gene in the hypertensive subjects (11.5%) comparing to normotensive ones (9.8%); the frequency of the allele D in the latter group increased in dependence of the decrease of the severity of AH. The prevalence of the genotype DD in the normotensive group was 4.5% and increased to 16.2% in the subjects with the arterial hypertension of mild degree, 17.3% of the hypertensive patients with arterial hypertension of moderate degree, and 32.7%--the subjects with arterial hypertension of severe degree. We established that the prevalence of the heterozygote genotype DD is significantly higher in the subjects with severe degree of AH comparing to the hypertensive patients with the mild form (chi(2) = 9.8; p = 0.009). This evidence gives a support to the association of the genetic polymorphism of the angiotensin-converting enzyme gene and the development of arterial hypertension.

Therefore, the heterotrimer is responsible for all the transduction of a signal from the receptor into the cell. In the absence of the presence of the.beta.-subunit, i.e., if the.alpha.-subunit is alone or in combination with a.beta.-subunit that is incapable of binding the.beta.-subunit, then the.alpha.-subunit, if present, is incapable of modulating a target. The function of the.beta.-subunits and their roles in the signal transduction process are unknown.
The interaction of ligands with receptors results in the activation of guanine nucleotide exchange proteins, resulting in the translocation of bound GDP to G proteins and the subsequent dissociation of the G proteins into.alpha.-subunit and.beta.-subunit moieties. The.beta.-subunit then can interact with another receptor, enzyme, ion channel, etc. The.alpha.-subunit is unable to interact with these receptors or enzymes, but it appears to modulate the effect of the.beta. subunit in doing so. Although several proteins have been isolated, only the alpha (.alpha.-subunit) and the.beta.-subunit of heterotrimer have been structurally defined (reviewed in Schriber and Simon, Trends in Neurosciences, Vol. 4, pp. 136-45 (1981); and Schriber and Simon, Biochem. J., Vol. 190, pp. 587-92 (1980)).

It has been found to be present as a component of the receptor of most G proteins of mammalian cells, where it is referred to as alpha (.alpha.-subunit). The alpha subunit, along with one of the.beta.-subunits (.beta.-subunit), forms a heterotrimer and is in fact the only subunit component of G protein involved in coupling to the receptor or other target. Therefore, the heterotrimer is responsible for all the transduction of a signal from the receptor into the cell. In the absence of the presence of the.beta.-subunit, i.e., if the.alpha.-subunit is alone or in combination with a.beta.-subunit that is incapable of binding the.beta.-subunit, then the.alpha.-subunit, if present, is incapable of modulating a target. The function of the.beta.-subunits and their roles in the signal transduction process are unknown. The interaction of ligands with receptors results in the activation of guanine nucleotide exchange proteins, resulting in the translocation of bound GDP to G proteins and the subsequent dissociation of the G proteins into.alpha.-subunit and.beta.-subunit moieties. The.beta.-subunit then can interact with another receptor, enzyme, ion channel, etc. The.alpha.-subunit is unable to interact with these receptors or enzymes, but it appears to modulate the effect of the.beta. subunit in doing so. Although several proteins have been isolated, only the alpha (.alpha.-subunit) and the.beta.-subunit of heterotrimer have been structurally defined (reviewed in Schriber and Simon, Trends in Neurosciences, Vol. 4, pp. 136-45 (1981); and Schriber and Simon, Biochem. answer: This research proposal is based upon the idea that the brain represents environmental stimuli in terms of an orderly sequence of states. For each state we are proposing the following; 1. A state, S, is represented as a vector whose components are all non-negative. For each stimulus, S, the state is made to evolve in time as follows. First, the vector is multiplied by the sensitivity constant or gain, r. Then, the element of the vector whose index k corresponds to the time at which the state evolves is squared. It is this element of the vector which is changed by the stimulus. The change has two components, a positive component and a negative component according to whether the index k is large or small. The resulting change in the vector is then added to the vector. After this subtraction action, the magnitude of the vector is normalized so that its square is 1. This normalized vector then represents the state of the brain at a moment just previous to the application of a stimulus. The vector for each state is stored. This approach leads to several advantages: 1. It is an efficient storage and representation of the state of the brain. 2. It can produce a state representation of any time-varying function. The approach applies to any function which is well-defined on a finite-time interval, but does not apply to time-varying functions with unbounded time. In its original form state representation was not able to apply to time-varying functions, but now it can. The state representation used in this research will be an efficient and appropriate representation for analyzing the neural activity time series data (microstates) obtained from visual, auditory, and olfactory stimuli. Data processing (neuroscience data) will be carried out in a commercial software environment using object-oriented techniques. The object-oriented philosophy makes it possible to develop a single application that handles time-varying signals well.

Eduardo Rondonha (10 November 1931 – 14 June 2014) was a Uruguayan football player and manager.

Playing career

Club career
In his playing career he played mostly for C.A. Peñarol between 1950 and 1962, playing in more than 200 official matches.

International career
Rondonhá played 4 games for Uruguay at the FIFA World Cup 1966 held in England. During this tournament, he also suffered an injury which made him miss the last game of the competition.

Managerial career
After retiring as a player, Rondonhá managed Peñarol from 1966 to 1969, winning the Uruguayan First Division for the first time in his history, and was also the manager of Nacional de Montevideo in 1969. He had a spell in Paraguay with General Díaz, in Bolivia with Club Litoral and in Paraguay again with Independiente.

Death
Rondonhá died on 14 June 2014. He was 75.

The invention is related to watercraft for personal and entertainment use, and more particularly, to personal watercraft using electrically powered propulsion.
Personal watercraft and similar vehicles are becoming more and more widespread as a vehicle of choice for a recreational enthusiast. The popularity of such watercraft is due to a number of factors. For example, they include a fairly low cost, as compared to personal automobiles, while being relatively light in weight and with an adequate passenger or driver compartment. The size also allows them to carry a relatively comfortable passenger seating area, especially with regard to the length of the body itself.
Such personal watercraft do have various disadvantages, however. For example, unlike a personal automobile that may carry various equipment such as an automotive horn, radio or tape player, etc., personal watercraft do not have such available. Some watercraft do provide additional options for the driver, such as a sound and/or navigation system, an entertainment system, etc. However, such optional features have typically been relatively expensive and complicated, particularly with regard to the wiring and electronics for the same.
In addition, while most watercraft do carry a suitable storage space, either in the form of a trunk or storage tanks, the same do not have room for accessories, such as sun shades, wind deflectors, a second storage area, etc.
Accordingly, there is a need for a personal watercraft that is a more economical to manufacture. Further, there is a need for a personal watercraft with a reduced number of components, and a simplified wiring/electronics.
Additionally, due to the above described deficiencies in watercraft vehicles, a watercraft is being sold as an accessory to the engine to provide a larger, higher power discharge. The watercraft is mounted to the vehicle in such a way that it is completely independent from the vehicle, and thereby independent from the vehicle""s engine.
Accordingly, the present invention provides a mounting system having a first mounting member for attachment to a watercraft having waterjets arranged in a desired arrangement. A second mounting member is attached about the periphery of the mounting member and provided with internal waterjets for discharging the water in any desired fashion or pattern. Further, the invention provides a third mounting member having waterjets that correspond to the first mounting member for supplying the water to the internal jets, as it is discharged around one or more of the mounting members. Therefore, the present invention allows an additional amount of water to be exhausted from the waterjets used for propulsion. Pre

Canada-U.S. Chamber of Commerce president Ben Eisenstadt says a huge number of U.S. residents are concerned about the U.S. President's policies. (CBC)

"That means jobs in business, trade and tourism."

The Canada-U.S. Index found that the vast majority of Americans who are concerned about a Trump presidency moving forward plan to spend less on travel, buy less technology, move closer to their job, keep their household size smaller, and consider working in the private sector.

Eisenstadt says there are a number of factors that should encourage Americans looking to relocate to Canada to take advantage of the opportunity.

"Canada's quality of life is extremely high," he said, citing the low cost of living in Canada and the availability of skilled labour.

"It's an easy choice when you have job opportunities, you have good quality of life, and Canadians are quite welcoming."

Overall, the report's author found a net gain of 4.9 million U.S. residents who are "not confident" about their futures in the U.S. — a jump of 1 million over the previous report.

Overall employment in the U.S. is down and job prospects are down, which was one of the primary reasons for the decline, according to the report.

"They have to decide whether to wait or make an investment," explained Eisenstadt.

The present invention relates to a method of and apparatus for determining the surface texture of a molded product, such as a plastic molding member for a variety of electronic components or the like.
It is known to form a molded product by pouring a thermoplastic material into a mold formed in the shape of the product, and heating the thermoplastic material to fix the molten thermoplastic material to the mold. Such molded product, especially a plastic molded product, generally includes minute void in the molded product. Consequently, it is not possible to form a molded product which has minute voids that are smaller than a specific size.
Furthermore, there are various kinds of voids generated depending upon the material of a molded product and the molding conditions used for forming the molded product. Accordingly, to inspect, control and measure the minute voids in a molded product, there are required complicated measurement conditions and measuring method.
There are known methods of determining the surface texture of a molded product, such as the method disclosed in, for example, U.S. Pat. Nos. 4,983,541, 5,060,527, 5,066,883, and 5,074,071, and Japanese Laid-Open Patent Publications No. 1-253977 and No. 3-293468. According to these methods, the molded product is scanned by a video camera to obtain a video image of the molded product, and the surface texture of the molded product is estimated based on the video picture. The method disclosed in Japanese Laid-Open Patent Publication 3-293468 is capable of providing accurate measurement results, but the method must be used with a molded product having a specific surface pattern. In other words, where minute voids have only random distribution, this measurement method is unable to estimate the detailed distribution of minute voids.
Other known methods of measuring surface texture include the method of using an atomic force microscope (AFM) to provide a two-dimensional image on the surface of a molded product. The AFM includes a probe for scanning and measuring the surface of a molded product by making the probe or the like interact with and contact the molded product, and a sensor for detecting the movement and vibration of the probe to detect the scanning position by the probe. The AFM thus determines the surface texture of a molded product from scanning movement and vibration of the probe. The Supreme Court has been asked to decide whether the Government in Washington can force the states of Washington and Oregon to make their own ballots. In this case, an immigrant, and voter who had been issued a U.S. visa, voted in a federal election on November 4, 2018, that was held over two days in both Washington and Oregon. His voting card showed he had voted at the poll in Cowlitz County, which includes an area of the Washington State side of the Columbia River that is geographically separate from Portland (and therefore the Cowlitz County portion of the Oregon electorate).

The Washington voter who voted in the 2018 election is plaintiff, Isaias Martinez, a citizen of Mexico who had been granted a U.S. visa, and who had been issued a state driver’s permit and an Oregon driver’s license with identification.

Isaias and the Plaintiff in a companion case, Ricardo Reyes-Perez (who was also a plaintiff but has since died), were allowed to register to vote while they were on a temporary visa in order to vote in the 2018 federal election. They did so, filling out mail-in application forms. But in the middle of the December 8, 2018 special election for Congress, the Department of Homeland Security issued a final revocation of the temporary visas, and their driver’s licenses and licenses as registered voters were cancelled, according to the DHS, because “it appear[ed] that these registered voters have unlawfully resided in the USA for a long period,” which is a form of inadmissible status under federal law. DHS was forced to act on the revoked visas, DHS wrote to the County Clerk of Douglas County, and it cancelled the drivers’ licenses and voter registrations of the two men, who had been forced to return to Mexico. These actions were taken even if the men had been planning to continue to live in the United States. DHS did not act on their applications to renew the visas that would have preserved the legality of their voter registrations and driver’s licenses for the long congressional election of November 6, 2018. That election was run in two Washington counties, King County (Seattle) and Pierce County (Tacoma).

The Secretary of State for Washington, and the Secretary of State for Oregon, are suing the U.S. government to protect the Washington and Oregon electorates from being “deprived of the opportunity to cast their votes for federal office.”

The Washington and Oregon elector

Joseph Beaudry (born October 16, 1945; age 69) is an American actor who began acting at the age of seven, after his father took up a job as a stockbroker. In 1956 he earned a part in the Broadway play "Cat on a Hot Tin Roof". He has appeared in The Bob Newhart Show (1972–1974) as Harry's supervisor. He earned another Broadway credit in "Lincoln at Gettysburg" (1976) and an Emmy nomination for the role in the "TV-movie" "The Devil and Daniel Webster" (1979). [2] He has appeared in various movies with his two sons, Joe Jr., age 18, and Joe III, age 17. He has twice (1982–1983) played Abraham Lincoln in the "The Great Train Robbery" (TV-movie) with his sons. He can be seen in the following movies: The Money Trackers (1971), Man's Favorite Sport? (1975), Night Slugs (1976), Black Widow (1987), and Back Roads (1989). He has a star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame for his contribution to TV. He also hosted the weekly TV show The Joseph Beaudry Show on The ABC/TV station KGO-TV (now KNTV, channel 11) in San Francisco, California, which ran from 1986 to 1991.

Joseph Beaudry was born as Joseph William Beaudry on 16 October 1945, in New York, New York. His mother, Helen (née Murphy), born in Ireland, and his father, William Henry Joseph Beaudry (1898-1972), born in Ireland, served in the US Navy as an Assistant Gunnery Officer during World War II. [3] Beaudry is a son of William Beaudry Jr. (1893-1947) and Mary Josephine "Josephine" Beaudry (born 1911; 1912-2000), who divorced when he was a toddler. According to his daughter, actress Mary (Righetti) Beaudry, he was the subject of a hoax in which he was given the surname "Joseph" so he would be identified by his real father and not by his two mothers. While he was born and raised in New York, his father was of Irish and French birth. He is of French-Canadian descent and traces the ancestry of his mother to the Scottish and Irish.
