The effects of chronic ethanol consumption on the activity and messenger RNA levels of CYP2E1, CYP3A2, and CYP3A4.
To elucidate the effects of chronic ethanol consumption on the expression of hepatic cytochrome P450 (CYP) 2E1, 2E1 enzyme activity, 3A2 and 3A4 protein levels, and messenger RNA transcriptional levels. Hepatic CYP2E1 enzyme activity and CYP3A2 and 3A4 protein levels were measured in rats fed various diets: Lieber-DeCarli liquid diets consisting of 10% ethanol (v/v) or 6% ethanol (w/v) for 4 or 7 weeks. To evaluate the transcriptional levels of these CYPs, hepatic CYP messenger RNA was measured in fed and fasting ethanol-consuming rats or pair-fed rats for 4 or 7 weeks. Hepatic CYP2E1 enzyme activity, CYP3A2, and 3A4 protein levels, and the transcriptional levels of CYP 3A5 mRNA and CYP 3A2 and 3A4 after fasting for 3 or 6 hr were studied for comparison. CYP2E1 enzyme activity was increased by up to 11-fold after 4 weeks and about threefold after 7 weeks and was accompanied by increased hepatic CYP3A2 and 3A4 protein levels. CYP3A5 mRNA levels did not change in either time span; however, CYP 3A2 and 3A4 mRNAs were increased several-fold after 4 weeks and 7 weeks of ethanol administration. CYP2E1 protein levels and enzyme activity in the fed and fasting rats were comparable in both time spans when compared with the corresponding controls. Fasting induced similar increases in the activities and the protein levels of both CYP2E1 and CYP3A4, suggesting that ethanol had no direct effect on their transcriptional control. Ethanol administration for 4 weeks and 7 weeks increased the transcriptional levels of both CYP2E1 and CYP3A4 in a manner similar to fasting. The increase in CYP2E1 protein levels and enzyme activity in rats consuming 30% ethanol (v/v) suggests a role for ethanol consumption in the pathogenesis of fulminant liver injury. A study from researchers at the University of Missouri shows that the most popular dieting tactic, intermittent fasting, may protect the brain better than other common weight-loss strategies — and could lead to improvements in attention, working memory, concentration and overall academic performance.

Share on Pinterest A study shows that eating more slowly helps the brain by keeping blood sugar levels more stable.

A study from researchers at the University of Missouri shows that the most popular dieting tactic, intermittent fasting, may protect the brain better than other common weight-loss strategies — and could lead to improvements in attention, working memory, concentration and overall academic performance. The researchers suggest that, in addition to improving brain health, a slower eating pattern could also help people lose weight.

A diet’s effect on attention

In a 2016 study, published in the journal Obesity, researchers analyzed the diets of 6,000 parents who were taking part in a nutrition and weight loss trial. They found that participants who were following a diet that involved eating one small meal a day and having three to four smaller meals each day experienced fewer brain and body changes than people who ate four times a day and two large meals.

However, this type of intermittent fasting technique, defined as eating fewer calories over the course of the day, has been linked to poor energy regulation, poor sleep and fatigue.

“Our diet recommendations and the current culture of eating speedily are promoting a detrimental lifestyle that is leading us to become a nation with a mental and physical health crisis on our hands,” says Dr. David L. Katz, one of the authors and director of the Center for Wellness and Prevention at the American College of Lifestyle Medicine.

In the new study, researchers note that slower food consumption helps keep blood sugar levels stable throughout the day, and also supports cardiovascular health by lowering the risk of type 2 diabetes. A 2015 study published in the journal Clinical Nutrition showed that eating food more slowly is also associated with a healthier metabolism, which could lead to improvements in other areas including learning.

An improved learning experience

In the 2018 study, published in the journal Appetite, Dr. Katz says that he and his colleagues studied the way foods were eaten to determine which eating pattern would most improve learning and memory. They chose to conduct the research at the University of Missouri Medical School, which is home to one of the oldest medical research programs in the U.S.

Wet-piling

Wet-piling is a term in the construction industry for a method of construction in which a pile or pile of material is driven into the ground and then backfilled in such a way that it is flush with the surrounding structure. This method is used when the soil underneath the surrounding structure consists of wet sand or mud. The wet sand or mud prevents the pile of material from being compacted by the surrounding soil during the initial driving phase. This can make the job of driving the pile easier and the resultant job at the end of construction easier.

When construction or excavation cannot or has not been performed, the construction crew may drive a "wet-pile" into the soil. Wet-piles allow rapid construction of walls, floors, and foundations with a minimum of effort, especially prior to construction of above ground structure such as buildings and apartment houses. It is sometimes done to give a house back to back parking or a garage to a house to give a parking spot. It can also be done for a swimming pool to create back drop. These can be done with steel or wooden pilings as needed.

Add an object to session in one activity, display it in another, and then destroy it

I have a small activity to add a contact to my application's session.
I add a contact in the contacts section of my app, and display it in an activity that lets me select from a phonebook. After selecting the contact, the contact is removed from my session and deleted from the user's phone.
All this works. Now, I want to destroy the contact after I've selected it from the phonebook, but it gets lost, I guess because I haven't done a reload.
What can I do to make sure that I keep this contact in memory between different sessions that need it or in different activities in my app?
I'm thinking of using a SharedPreferences but I don't know what data I should store. Do I add something to an existing shared pref, to that I can look it up in the other activity and use it, or should I create a whole new SharedPreferences with everything I need in it?

A:

SharedPreferences data is removed when the process of your app ended.
So when a new activity is started the SharedPreferences are empty
I suggest that you use either internal storage (use getDir), which is deleted when the activity is destroyed. or Sqlite as you can store the data
you will save the data before the activity ends.

A review of the impact on the skin and body from conventional gas-fired appliances in contact with the skin.
Gas-fired appliances have been used for many years to heat and to provide energy to homes and workplaces, and new types are being developed. Since gas-fired heating systems contain high temperatures, they are of interest to scientists and engineers concerned with the thermal properties of the human body, and also to environmental scientists who wish to minimize their contribution to outdoor air pollution. In this paper, we review the current knowledge on the effects of gas-fired heating on the skin and body, by examining the literature on the subjects related to three heating systems: the traditional gas system, and systems that use the gas-driven cycle in association with the conventional electric heating system (gas-electric hybrid heating); i.e., the gas system, gas-electric hybrid system, electric system, gas system (combined heat and power system). We report that in general, the skin of users of gas-fired appliances shows less sensitivity and irritation than the skin of users of electric systems. The thermal properties of the skin will also be more affected by the gas-fired systems, which emit higher levels of heat and humidity, than the gas-electric hybrid system.

The metal back is reminiscent of the One M9, and indeed, while it’s thin, the device is still very heavy. Flexible and high-capacity hydrogen storage: Fe-based, cation-exchanged zeolite H-ZSM-5 nanocable.
The synthesis of an alloyed nanocable of zeolite H-ZSM-5 through a solvent-free method in the presence of Fe is described. The nanocable was characterized by X-ray diffraction (XRD) and nuclear magnetic resonance (NMR) spectroscopy that suggested formation of a 2D sheet of a bimetallic, Fe3O4-NbWO6, composite with the zeolite H-ZSM-5 channels. The addition of Fe to the zeolite H-ZSM-5 significantly enhanced the adsorption of hydrogen in the hydrogen storage materials, as shown by the increase in storage capacity. The use of the nanocable as an ideal hydrogen storage material was further demonstrated by its high charge/discharge (6.4) and gravimetric hydrogenation/oxidation (9.3) performance under a pure hydrogen atmosphere at high gravimetric current densities (>200 mA g(-1)) for more than 240 hr without any noticeable degradation in the desorption performance.

Q:

Can you use the same IP/MAC address for all your clients in LAN (10.0.0.0,192.168.x.xxx)?

I am a novice network engineer who is in the process of adding a layer three firewall to my company server network on the cheap.  I am using an Ubiquity UniFi controller V1.3.1 (The controller is essentially an Arduino with a NIC, Ethernet shield and web server bundled.)
I've decided I'd like to add a layer three firewall to use as a transparent proxy for in-house traffic, and so far the cheapest way I could think of doing this is buying some cheap home wireless routers (one of them costing a pound), and putting them in a LAN (192.168.x.xxx) on top of the UniFi controller and use MAC address-based VLAN routing to route different client traffic to different subnets. E.g. client A's 192.168.x.xxx 192.168.0.x will be routed to the LAN, while clients B and C are routed to a subnet of 192.168.1.x.
The plan seems to work fine, but I was wondering if it's possible to save on resources and allow all clients on the system with one IP/MAC address or do you have to use a different one for each client (like a static ARP entry)?
I have absolutely no practical experience on this front so apologies if my plan seems like the obvious thing to do.  I would appreciate any help on the matter.
Cheers.

A:

Short answer is no.  It's not possible to assign a single IP address with a single MAC address, that's just how networking works.  The reason you can assign multiple IP addresses to a single MAC address is because the MAC address in the MAC layer is actually a 48-bit number and so is capable of handling a lot more than a single IP address.
When you setup multiple network interfaces in a layer 3 device, such as VLAN configuration, they share that same MAC address.  As an example, I have a network card in a layer 3 switch which has 2 network interfaces, one is connected to the outside wide area network (WAN) and one is connected to the local area network (LAN).  They both have a dedicated IP address that is statically assigned (in my case, 10.100.24.24, 10.100.25

Golf carts, as in other vehicles, are traditionally powered by a single-cylinder engine that propels the cart to desired stops and locations, whether in a golf course, on the public streets or in shopping areas.
To operate the cart, the operator must use the vehicle steering mechanism to pull the vehicle forward with the steering mechanism. Then, when the vehicle stops, the operator simply pushes on the brake pedal to deactivate the propulsion device, and the vehicle stops. Thus, the operator must use the steering mechanism to control the forward speed until the vehicle stops, then the vehicle comes to stop.
The above design makes efficient use of energy, only when, for example, going down a hill can the operator keep the wheel in its direction. However, the design does not permit the operator to use the vehicle, for example, to travel a greater distance during one braking event than another braking event would take to bring the vehicle to stop. Furthermore, the operator does not have any way to estimate the distance that the vehicle can be propelled before the vehicle stops.
An important problem of the design of the previous single-cylinder golf cart vehicle is that the operator of the golf cart must, when stopping to play, rely on the experience of the operator, who feels where the cart will stop when it comes to stop. There is no way to quantify the braking power of the operation, and therefore, the operator cannot control the stopping distance of the vehicle to assure that he/she is traveling a safe distance. Thus, the amount of stopping distance is subject to a subjectively sensed lack of experience on the part of the operator. Additionally, due to the absence of an automatic stopping system, there is no way to quantify the stopping power of the vehicle.
Thus, a need has long existed for a system that permits a user of a vehicle, for example a golf cart, to safely stop the vehicle when necessary, when the vehicle is traveling. Furthermore, a need has long existed for a method and system that is a component of the vehicle, which measures the speed and distance that the vehicle travels prior to arrival of a defined time or distance location. These and other objects will be clear from the summary of this specification, the drawings, and the claims.

The present invention relates to a magnetic recording reproducing apparatus for reproducing a magnetic recording medium and particularly to such apparatus of a type in which in the absence of a magnetic layer defect existing in a magnetic recording medium or a portion thereof, a reproducing waveform is produced without a recorded data or data to be reproduced in place of a waveform, having defective reproduction at the recording, thereby to prevent a false reproduction and ensure accurate reproduction.
For example, in a magnetic recording apparatus for recording a digital audio signal, if any defect exists in a signal waveform, the recorded data signal may suffer an error which prevents the reproduction and is thus defective. Therefore, it becomes essential to enable reproducing data in the case of such defect irrespective of its existence.
Heretofore proposed as a technique for overcoming such defect is a reproduction controlling technique disclosed in U.S. Pat. No. 3,854,906 granted to H. H. Wagner on Dec. 17, 1974. The Wagner patent relates to a magnetic reproduction apparatus having a pulse detection circuit which detects the end of a gap, between recorded bits, during a reproduction period. The detected pulse is applied to two successive time-division circuits, with a resultant signal being applied to two successive comparator circuits, with a result that the output level of the first comparator circuit to which the end of the gap is applied is used in a level-holding circuit and that the output of the second comparator circuit is inverted and applied to a sample-and-hold circuit, so that in the absence of a recording gap, the output of the sample-and-hold circuit is held near a zero level.
In the reproduction controlling technique described in the Wagner patent, however, the end of the gap is detected in a form of a pulse, and therefore, a correct end of the gap can not be detected in the case where the gap length is shorter than one bit. Furthermore, since the end of the gap during the reproduction period is determined at the time of reproduction, it is impossible to hold information as to whether a defect exists in the reproduced waveform of the gap length.
In addition, in the recording and reproduction apparatus of the type in which signal processing is performed for a plurality of channels at a speed close to the speed at which recording and reproduction are performed, in order to realize a high speed system, a number of reproduced signals must be processed in the apparatus, with a resultant increased length of the path between the processing channels in which the processing is performed.

The subject matter disclosed herein relates to electric machines. More specifically, the subject disclosure relates to systems and methods for cooling electric machines.
A variety of systems use electrical machines. In addition to the use of electrical machines for driving the vehicles in the systems, an electrically motor may be used as power source for driving other components such as a compressor. In some applications, the compressor may be used to extract air for generating compressed air for driving other devices or for simply storing the air for future use.
The use of electrical drives is becoming a more prevalent solution in these applications. Electrical drives are relatively efficient and often use relatively low RPM to achieve the desired compression. However, the electrical drives require extensive cooling for the mechanical and electric components. In many applications cooling air is blown over the components to remove the heat. The cooling air, however, is often mixed with the compressed air and/or ambient air from the environment. This mixing of the ambient air with the cooling air reduces the efficiency of the system due to the mixing of gases having different thermal capacities and also raises a safety concern due to the mixing of the compressed air with the ambient air.

The present invention relates generally to network architectures, and especially to a technique for building software-defined networking using a network-on-a-chip architecture.
As computers increasingly become connected over computer networks via the Internet and other networks, so the computers must be able to communicate with other computers in order to transmit and receive data. This communication process, called xe2x80x9cinterconnecting,xe2x80x9d can be performed in a number of ways.
The simplest approach is a single-wire network, in which there is simply a cable or other physical communications link connecting two or more computers. A second approach is the standard Internet protocol (IP), which is the network-layer protocol used by Internet-based applications to route data packets between the computers. One popular family of IPs is known as xe2x80x9cEthernets,xe2x80x9d which was developed in the late 1970""s. There are seven layers to a typical Ethernet protocol stack: application layer, transport link layer, network layer, link layer, physical layer, data-link layer and media access control (MAC) layer. In contrast to IP, which has routing capabilities, the Ethernet uses a protocol known as Carrier Sense Multiple Access with Collision Detection (CSMA/CD) to ensure robust communication between two devices over a shared, serial link.
However, the IEEE 802.11 family of wireless access technologies and its derivatives are becoming more popular among the xe2x80x9cInternet-at-homexe2x80x9d. Wireless IEEE 802.11-based technologies provide not only an easy way for a user to plug in and connect a laptop to the Internet, but also the ability to use wireless devices to support an ad-hoc mode of routing traffic not otherwise handled by IP protocols. Because of this, it is desirable to be able to support 802.11 protocols together with one or more Ethernet protocols in a single computer. A popular family of 802.11 protocols is known as xe2x80x9cWi-Fi (wireless fidelity),xe2x80x9d which is a family of IEEE protocols which run over the Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers (IEEE) 802.11(a) and IEEE 802.11(b) standards. A comparative investigation into the effects of an oral glucose tolerance test on the development of atherogenesis.
To investigate the differences in the development of atherogenesis between healthy subjects and patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus (T2DM) and to investigate whether the results vary after an oral glucose tolerance test (OGTT). The T2DM cases (20 people, aged 28-51 years old, with a body mass index [BMI] of from 23.5 to 35) were classified into three groups (T2DM I, T2DM II, and T2DM III) according to the level of glycosylated hemoglobin (HbA1(C)). All 40 participants underwent an OGTT. Aortic intima-media thickness (AIMT) was measured with ultrasonography. After the OGTT, the participants were subjected to the 75-g glucose tolerance test (GTT) from their plasma glucose values every 20 min for 1 h. The T2DM II group showed significantly higher BMI, mean fasting plasma glucose, and HbA1(C) levels than the other two groups (i.e., the control group and the T2DM I group). As a result of the OGTT, the T2DM II group showed a higher plasma glucose level at 60 and 90 min than that at other time-points. A significant difference in the HbA1(C) level was observed between the T2DM II and the other two groups. Additionally, higher AIMT values and plasma lipid levels, such as triglycerides, total cholesterol, and low-density lipoprotein cholesterol, were observed in the T2DM II group compared with the T2DM I and control groups in the OGTT-GTT examination. The results of comparative studies using OGTT revealed that the T2DM II patients showed atherosclerosis of a higher level than T2DM I and control patients did, with increased atherogenic lipid levels after an OGTT. OGTTs could be performed easily at any time without much burden for the patients.

The present invention relates generally to the field of computer vision and more specifically, to the detection, tracking, and navigation of objects within a scene or environment.
Detecting and tracking a particular, or a collection of, objects of interest (such as pedestrians, cars in traffic jams, or animals in an open field) within an image acquired by a camera, such as an overhead-view camera or a side camera in a moving vehicle, is an important computer vision task that finds a number of applications, including but without limit on the examples below. For example, intelligent video surveillance systems in public spaces facilitate security, surveillance, and safety in public areas, and are critical to law enforcement (as an example, identifying and recognizing criminal faces in a video feed from surveillance cameras is the basis of facial recognition). The detection and tracking of people in traffic jams not only helps provide useful information for in-car navigation, but also helps provide data useful for traffic management, for example the accurate number of cars in a jam for traffic management (as an example, the video feed from a traffic camera in a traffic jam is very useful for determining the number of cars in the lane just before the traffic jam). Similarly, the detection and tracking of animals in an open field helps farmers estimate animal populations in a field, helping determine which animals need to be culled to maintain a field's biological health. Thus, such a system helps achieve the objectives of the owner for which it operates.
There are a number of prior art approaches to object detection and tracking. However, these prior approaches have a number of disadvantages. For example, there are a number of traditional image-processing approaches, starting with traditional edge-based approaches (such as Haralick et al., “Textural image characterization”, IEEE Transactions on Systems, Man, and Cybernetics, SMC-7(2):121-136, July 1974; and G. M. Basheer et al., Eigenfaces for recognition: Recognition of faces and handwritten digits, Proc. 1988 Int. Joint Conf. on Neural Networks, San Diego, Calif., December 1988), that can be used to detect people in video and image sequences, but which are unsuitable for detecting people in low-quality, sub-optimal image sequences. The U.S. Senate could vote on whether to block President Donald Trump’s $8.6 billion emergency funding request by Wednesday night, according to NBC News.

“If the president puts this request forward, the Senate will have the opportunity to vote on whether to block the president’s action,” Senate Majority Leader Mitch McConnell said during his weekly press conference on Tuesday.

McConnell’s statement is sure to inflame critics because, after first refusing last month to take up the president’s funding request, the Kentucky Republican took it up only after the Pentagon said it had spent nearly $500 million on the president’s call for more funding of the military’s southern border wall and argued his $5.7 billion request was the first step in getting Congress to go along.

“This action is part of the Administration’s further efforts to circumvent Congress and build the wall at the southern border by declaring a national emergency,” the Pentagon said in a statement to NBC News, explaining that it would transfer $601.6 million of funds currently allocated for military personnel to the border.

McConnell has also been criticized for giving the White House far more leeway than normal to make requests for emergency money. That process was meant to be completed days earlier than usual, before a government shutdown was averted with the help of a short-term funding bill, in order to prevent President Trump from declaring a national emergency and redirecting billions of dollars earmarked for military construction for his border wall.

On Monday, McConnell told the press that he “did not feel comfortable” with the president’s demand that Congress pass the border wall funding ahead of a scheduled two week government shutdown, which is the result of the government failing to pass a spending bill. “I don’t think any member wants to be in that situation.”

But on Tuesday, McConnell said that he would approve the Pentagon spending request — the first time he has done so, he said.

“It is a fact that we have enough funding in the defense accounts,” he told the press about the funding that is being diverted.

The announcement followed a speech on Tuesday in which House Speaker Nancy Pelosi suggested that it wasn’t appropriate to give “backdoor amnesty through the military construction budget” for the border wall project, and criticized the president for trying to circumvent Congress.

[Preliminary results of treatment of the femoro-popliteal and tibio-basal arteries with percutaneous transluminal angioplasty. Preliminary technic in 3 cases].
Percutaneous transluminal angioplasty (PTA) has been described in the literature for almost 60 year, as recently as 1972 (2) but was applied only in the last 15 years (4,5). There is now some discussion on the possibility of using this technique in the treatment of the femoro-popliteal and tibio-basal arteries (6). This kind of treatment is, in the vast majority of cases, carried out in patients with ischaemia of rest in stage 2 of Leriche's classification (1). This operation, in some cases, requires the sacrifice of a distal artery that by necessity has to be ligated or replaced. The authors are reporting that they have attempted to do everything they can to keep these distal vessels as long as possible and to avoid the necessity of replacing them. These results suggest that percutaneous transluminal angioplasty can be used, with great prudence, in stage 1 and in some cases in stage 2 Leriche's disease.

The invention also relates to the produced non-spherical particle in addition to the use of the spherical particle for the preparation of the non-spherical particle.
A non-spherical particle for example in the form of a rod or needle-like particle, such as, for example a non-spherical particle in the form of a rod or needle-like particle containing active ingredients such as vitamins, is used for example as a delivery system or as a carrier for active ingredients that are dissolved or suspended in water.
Nonspherical (spherical or cylindrical) particles of this type are manufactured or produced, for example, by spray drying. Depending on the particle size distribution desired, between 5 and 50 or more spray nozzles are commonly used for this purpose. Spraying on of the suspension into an organic continuous phase or into a vaporizable emulsifier is thereby performed. As a rule, the particles produced in this way are spherical and have non-uniform dimensions and particle size distributions. In particular the so-called “spherulites” can form, which are in very fine needle-like form and are characterized by the fact that during crystallization they are oriented in particular directions and are linked together.
However, the particles produced in this way in general have spherical properties, which does not always meet the requirements in the pharmaceutical field, in particular with respect to the storage conditions of the active ingredient and the active ingredient carrier.
Furthermore, rod-shaped particles of this type can only be manufactured by using a plurality of nozzles. In the known manufacturing methods, use is generally made of droplet vaporization, for example, or the precipitation of a spherical suspension of material by using a polymer. Dynamics of DNA melting and structural heterogeneity in mixed self-complementary RNA/DNA-melting helicase complexes.
Transcriptional and post-transcriptional regulation of gene expression involves DNA melting and unwinding by proteins called transcription/replication/repair (R) factors. The DNA duplex consists of two DNA strands with Watson-Crick base pairs and may have more than one structure. The heterogeneity of DNA structures that can be traversed by small proteins is difficult to characterize biochemically. For instance, a homoduplex nucleic acid or a DNA oligonucleotide can have hairpin (HP), three-arm, four-arm or five-arm junctions (J), or even form a continuous loop. In the present work, kinetic studies that employ a new fluorescent DNA-melting assay, with single-mismatch discrimination, at 1 degree C/s allowed us to characterize the stability of the homoduplex (HP) and mixed sequences containing one homoduplex region (HP) and one hairpin junction (HP/J) within a complementary oligonucleotide (HP/HH/HHH' and HP/HH/HHJ and HH' respectively). The HP/HH/HHH' and HP/HH/HHJ sequence have similar melting curves (T(m) approximately 65 degrees C) to those of B-form DNA (T(m) approximately 71 degrees C) and the corresponding mixed sequences melting curves have close to one-third the T(m). However, the T(m1/2) values obtained for the homoduplexes are approximately 6 degrees higher than that of the corresponding single homoduplexes of A-form DNA, revealing an increase in the thermal stability of the complex. In two further homoduplexes containing hairpin junctions of different lengths, T(m1/2) values are increased to 7-9 degrees C. These results indicate that the introduction of a single hairpin junction by insertion of non complementary oligonucleotides decreases the stability of the corresponding homoduplexes. Inhibition assays using S.cerevisiae R2 protein and its mutant variants R2-W22A and R2-W24A confirm that hairpin formation is critical in the RNA-R2 binding process and that residues W22 and W24 are important for DNA-unwinding mechanisms.

Is it wrong to get the average for an answer when none of the other answers are given?

I have a question about math contests.
Is getting the average for an answer when none of the other given answers are correct wrong? Should you give all correct answers in order to have the correct average? The answers are correct but just for one answer and I am giving the average of the other given answers. Should I change the average?

A:

When you give your own answer you don't have to provide additional information. The average is based on how many problems you've answered correctly and how many problems you've provided an answer.

A:

From the rules of the Mathematics League

The contest takes place over the course of the calendar year, in March.
All contestants will submit as few or as many
      answers as are given and the contest's points will be computed
      based on the number of correct, partially correct and incorrect
      entries submitted. Any contestant who cannot supply the maximum
      number of entries given during the contest year cannot possibly
      gain enough points for the Contest of the Year! 
In order to make the contest fair, contestants are allowed to skip
      some problems but not too many.  In a word-search problem for
      which you have supplied the first letter-sound-word, you can
      provide an unlimited number of solutions to the first word, but
      you are limited to two solutions for the subsequent letters.
      However, all other solutions to this problem can be used to
      provide the average for the contest. You may have up to two
      answers for each problem, but each answer must be used exactly
      once. 
The winner of the contest will be the contestant who has the highest
      average.

So technically your answer does provide additional information.

A:

If you get the result of $6/4=1.5$ for one of the answers, it's not wrong. It's an indication that your given the best answer and provided no other. If you only did that for one of the answers, you should be awarded $0.

Is there any way to see the value of the default parameter?

After writing a program that does
def function(i=0):
   ...

if I try to call it with 0 (or with 1 instead of it), it will print some error.
But as soon I change it to
def function(i=1):
   ...

It will work.
So, is there any way to see the default value of the parameter in the definition?
Thank you!

A:

You can use inspect.getdefaultargspec(), but it doesn't give the default value:
>>> def f(i=0): print i
>>> inspect.getdefaultargspec(f)
(['i', 'arg'], [])

Note, it gives the arguments which python will pass to __call__

Anthropometric Characteristics in High-Level Female Athletes.
This study is the first of its size, and the first of its kind, to examine the body composition in highly successful women athletes from various sporting disciplines. The purpose of this study was to investigate whether elite female athlete status is related to better percent body fat values. Elite athletes were recruited through direct contact with Olympic Development Program (ODP) coaches and through media advertisements. The control group was age-matched non-athletes. Physical characteristics of height and body mass were recorded and percentage of fat, fat-free mass, muscularity, lean body mass, body water proportion, and percent body fat distribution were determined via bioelectrical impedance. Total lean body mass was significantly greater (p <.05) in elite athletes than controls with no significant difference in total body water and fat-free mass (p >.05). Body fat percentage values were significantly (p <.05) lower by an average of 6.2% in elite athletes compared with controls. Lean body mass was significantly greater (p <.05) in elite athletes by an average of 4.2% above controls. There was no significant difference in percent body fat distribution between athletes and controls (p >.05). Results for elite athletes were similar when subdivided by sport type. Body fat percentage differences were significantly greater (p <.05) in basketball and gymnastics with the largest differences in volleyball (8.1%) tennis (7.2%). These differences in percent body fat between elite athletes and controls are potentially beneficial and more pronounced in athletes whose sport requirements may be more dependent on lean mass, such as gymnastics and basketball. The findings suggest that lean body mass may be greater in elite women athletes compared with non-athletes and lean body mass may be more critical to success in female athletes compared with male athletes.

Growth of Bacillus megaterium in media fortified with corn oil as the sole carbon and energy source.
Cultures of Bacillus megaterium at late log phase in minimal synthetic media in which corn oil was the sole source of carbon and energy for growth were incubated for several weeks. Cells from the incubated cultures were examined with electron microscopy and with conventional staining methods for nucleic acids, and also were assayed for growth in a range of media. Bacteria grew on and between plant oil emulsion droplets, indicating that they originated from the oil, but did not cause the oil to coalesce. There was no evidence of extracellular structures. Staining of nucleic acids with the fluorescent stain SYTO 9 in the electron microscope revealed the presence of cells and free ribosomes but not chromosome or membrane-bound ribosome-containing structures in the cell. Electron microscopy showed no evidence of cell walls or spores. Growth of cells incubated in minimal media was poor or absent when the cell density and/or the length of incubation was reduced. Although the results described show that corn oil is a suitable energy source for B. megaterium, they also suggest a number of aspects for future consideration, and highlight the potential to increase efficiency of bioreactor usage.

It’s Time to Rebrand the World of Dancehall

Over the past few years, the Jamaican dancehall has emerged as arguably the most compelling new music sound in today’s international soundscape. Driven by artists such as Sean Paul, Rude Boy, Spice, Sizzla-Empire, and others, the genre has found international commercial success as Jamaica has become a leading producer of high-quality dancehall and Reggae music.

The rapid rise of the genre is directly related to the growth of Jamaican dancehall—it is the strongest and purest brand of the genre in a business that has seen many other styles of the genre try to imitate it. For years, the industry saw dancehall as an easy way to reach the Jamaican market, since the dancehall’s core audience of young Rastas already know the music and have strong ties to the culture.

The problem is that the industry simply couldn’t compete with the high-quality products coming out of Jamaica. While we at the US market had to wait years for dancehall to cross over into our market, it was no problem whatsoever coming into the Jamaican market. In fact, even though many Rastas from Jamaica are used to a market filled with English-language pop (as opposed to the original genre, reggae), the Rastas seem to have an almost instinctive sense of dancehall. This results in huge numbers at dancehall-centric festivals and shows, like the Jamaican International Reggae & Dancehall Festival (JIRDCF) and Reggae Sunsplash.

A few years back, we saw the introduction of dancehall into the US market. The first dancehall artists that came out of Jamaica for the US market, like Elephant Man and Mavado, were essentially rap music in dancehall clothing. They did not speak English much if at all, and the music was heavily influenced by rap. Most US dancehall artists today speak at least some English, with many even having studied abroad for the purpose (Sizzla-Empire has lived in England for close to a decade). As the product became successful and dancehall gained more ground in the US, an increasing number of producers made the crossover and began to make more English-language music. While some of those producers were talented, the product often was not close enough to dancehall for many US audiences, which meant that most US dancehall fans had very little to identify

Theoretical Investigation of the Reaction Dynamics between H-Rb and CH2(X2Pi)-Sr.
The title reactions from H-Rb complexes to the CH2X2Pi endo structures of the title compounds through three pathways are investigated with high-level ab initio and multireference complete active space and coupled cluster theory using six-, seven-, and eight-electron active basis sets on the X2Pi-Sr basis set. Three different theoretical approaches are used for the title reactions; that is, the quasirelativistic and spin-orbit zero-point energy calculations (AQRO), the multireference coupled cluster theory within the singles and doubles (MRCCSD), and the multireference second order perturbation theory (MRCCSDT) calculations. This study is done for the first time to obtain a full understanding of the reaction dynamics of the title reactions. The calculations show that the endo structures of the title molecules prefer through the CH2X2Pi/1(4)A2 pathway over the CH2X2Pi/1(2)A1 transition-state with activation energies below 3 kcal mol(-1) and the other pathways with activation energies above 4 kcal mol(-1). The CH2X2Pi endo structures are found to be the most stable and have the lowest energy barrier. The CH2X2Pi endo structures are more easily formed through the CH2X2Pi/1(2)A1 transition than the CH2X2Pi/1(4)A2 transition-state. The title reactions are more easily formed in the heavier alkali atom and through the CH2X2Pi/1(2)A1 transition, which shows good agreement with the available experimental data [N. S. Aravind and D. R. Bates, J. Chem. Phys. 104, 10, 1995]. Our results demonstrate that the title reactions from H-Rb complexes to the CH2X2Pi endo structures of the title molecules can be exoergonic and are potential experimental targets for the alkali dihydrogen formation.

How to get the URL of the previous page in a UIPickerView?

I need to get the previous page of a UIPickerView. How can I do that? Is this possible?
Something like, on a button click: 
var previousUrl:String = "";
previousUrl = pickerView.getPreviousPageUrl();

A:

You can try using UIPickerViewDelegate's pickerView(_:viewForRow:forComponent:) method.
Use that to return the view of the "previous page".
The delegate gets the index values by sending a UIPickerviewDelegate method like -(nonnull NSInteger)pickerView:(UIPickerView *)pickerView numberOfRowsInComponent:(NSInteger)component
Use that to decide where to start drawing the next page.
You could cache and save the previous view to re-use it again.
Of course, this is just an idea.

Q:

Should I close question as duplicate based on another question that doesn't really answer the question?

A question that comes up quite often is one of this type:

How to install a.bin file?

which is essentially "how to install this file" type questions. The answer to it usually works fine for most files, but for other files, some kind of command-line tool or command is required, or special software.
I find myself on Stack Overflow every 20 minutes, sometimes closer to 10, but often on every 10-15 minutes asking questions about binary files.
The other site that comes up is Windows.SE. The answer to the question "How to install a.bin file" is usually to download and run a tool, like 7-Zip, which can unpack any zip file. However, that's not really answering the question, because zip files can often be opened and examined in a graphical app like Winzip, 7-zip, or Total Commander without any special tools. It also takes longer than 10 seconds to open a bin file without a command-line tool. A command-line tool that is really an app-like interface for reading a file is WinRar.
The question really should be answered on Super User, Super User, so I tend to flag it there.
But, the problem is, in most cases, the only reason the question asks for a command-line tool is, if the file is opened by 7-zip in Winzip, there's no reason to open it on 7-zip. Winzip does exactly the same as WinRar, except 7-zip can open.bin and.zip in the same window. Thus, it's usually closed or suggested.
The problem is, if there's another question on Stack Overflow, a similar or equivalent question exists for a Winzip, where that question is probably closed, even though it's exactly the same question, but for a.bin or.zip or another format.
So it's not a duplicate, the problem is not in the same topic, but two different topics, and since it's more easy to close a question based on another one, the question should be closed as a duplicate.

A:

Close as duplicate if it covers a wider range of situations
When the question on SO can be solved by looking at the other question, which doesn't cover the same situations, then it is right to close as duplicate. Otherwise

[Chronic fatigue state scale: a questionnaire for the screening of fatigue and its associated factors].
The purpose of this study was to identify a screening tool to assess chronic fatigue state (CFS) in order to help clinicians to make an initial differential diagnosis of fatigue and identify possible risk factors. The following issues were explored: prevalence and demographic distribution of the CFS; psychometric properties; clinical significance; and association with other somatic symptoms, mental health, and work ability. The CFS scale was developed as a self-reported 25-item questionnaire among a sample of 1686 employees belonging to a wide range of professions working in the private sector. Data were collected by telephone interviews in a cross-sectional study. The data were analyzed by using univariate and multivariate logistic regression. The prevalence of CFS was 39.6 %; the highest prevalence was reached among primary care physicians. The overall quality of the scale was good. No associations with other symptoms and mental health conditions were found. There was an association with the loss of workability. The CFS scale is an appropriate instrument for screening of chronic fatigue state. Associations found in the study may provide a rationale for the pathophysiological processes involved in the etiology of CFS.

The present disclosure relates to an image processing apparatus, a digital camera, a digital imaging system, and a storage medium.
In recent years, a digital camera that uses an imaging element such as a CCD or CMOS has come into widespread use. Because of its high picture quality and ease of handling, the digital camera is used for many purposes, e.g., recording of scenes of everyday life, recording of motion pictures, reproduction of still images for printing, reproduction of data for other processing, recording of information of a site visited with a portable terminal, and the like.
In such a digital camera, a large number of pixels of the imaging element that generates an image of a subject are arranged in a matrix configuration, and a subject image to be captured or photographed is acquired in the form of electrical signals by turning on the pixels by reading out electrical signals from them by so-called rolling shutter drive. In read-out driving, the imaging element is turned on row by row during vertical driving and output information of the imaging element for each row line is read out row by row.
With this read-out driving, at a point where high brightness objects are imaged, image noise (i.e., random and periodic patterns) caused in the read-out drive has a high probability of being observed at that point.
In the case of an imaging apparatus in which images with high brightness and high noise suppression characteristics are to be generated by reducing image noise, there are a technique of correcting an image using image noise reduction data acquired during noise reduction, and a technique of acquiring a low-noise image while suppressing image noise by reducing noise at read-out.

Q:

How to access a variable of the same Object from two Class

I would like to create my own data storage format for a multiplayer game.
It consists of multiple objects (each object corresponds to a class) that are connected within an array.
I was hoping, that I can access this data from any object, just as all objects of the game will have access to the same set of variables.
My main problem is that I don't know how to achieve this in a type safe way.
To clarify:

I want the object to hold the data
I want to access this data via Object-Reflection
I would like to have some common, type safe variables
(or at least some variables that do not change for the whole game)

Is this even possible?

A:

You can use composition over inheritance.
In the game data class you have an Array of Component. This class contains the functionality for holding the data.
The component class defines the type safety that you want.
The component can be added to the arrays or the game data object and it can be accessed by all game data components. You could even create new objects of the game data class by adding a new component.
If you want that the components can be updated then you can use the Decorator Pattern.

An object may be decorated with a new type of information, to it or to
  items referred to by this object or by the objects it inherits from.

I hope, that this approach may be of help.

A little something about me

I have a wonderful family, and many great friends. I am married to a wonderful woman whom you will all know and love as soon as I introduce you. Her husband, Chris, is also very active on the blog. They work together on our business selling Christmas cards at two great craft stores. I have one daughter, Jessica, and one son Luke.

On my blog I try to post daily. Occasionally, I post other things at irregular intervals because I have a lot going on. I try to post daily, but it just hasn't happened for a while.

On a personal level, I am a Mormon. I believe I am a pretty boring Mormon, but I try to keep my boringness to myself when blogging because some people would like to think I am weird and stuff.

I am the kind of person who puts other people's needs before his. (Even if nobody is noticing.) Although I try to stay strong and be a pillar of strength when I am doing this, sometimes I don't. Which is one reason I am so careful how much I write.

As for my hobbies, I enjoy reading, writing, hiking, spending time with my family and friends, being a member of the LDS Church, and listening to music. My musical tastes tend to be in the rock-and-roll persuasion.

I am a Christian and I have my share of disagreements with many of my fellows, but I love them, and try to treat them as well as possible. There is no one I know who's better than they are, and I am thankful for each of them.

Formalism and the law of identity in axiomatisation of logic

$L_\lambda = ⟨A, P, <⟩$, $A = \{a_1, a_2, \cdots\}$, $P =\{ p_1, p_2, \cdots\}$,$ < =\{ <_1, <_2, \cdots\}$ are sets of non-logical symbols and $\tau, \bot, \top$ are respectively the truth values of $t$, the false and the truth.
Given two sets a,b$ \subset A$. Define
$[a]^\tau = \{x_1 \in A :x_1 < a \} $
$[b]^\tau = \{x_1 \in B: x_1<_b \}$
$[a]^s = \{x_1 |x_1<a\}$
$[b]^s = \{x_1|x_1<b\}$
Prove that $[a]^\tau \not= [b]^\tau$ iff $[a]^s \not=[b]^s$ and $a$ does not imply $b$ 
Hint: consider $a_1$ and $a_2$ with $a_1<a_2$. 
Note that
(i)$ [b]^\tau = [b]^s$
(ii) $[a]^\tau \subseteq[a]^s $ and $[b]^\tau \subseteq [b]^s $

A:

Here's a hint: $$[a]^\tau\subseteq [a]^s \quad\Leftrightarrow\quad b\in[a]^\tau\quad\Leftrightarrow\quad 
\forall x_1\in[b]^\tau [x_1<a]\Leftrightarrow\forall x_1\in[b]^s [x_1<a]\Leftrightarrow [b]^\tau\subseteq [b]^s$$

L'Atelier d'Alain Delon

L'Atelier d'Alain Delon is a 2009 French drama-comedy film directed by Alain Guiraudie.

Plot
In 1978, Alain Guiraudie is a young actor-director attending a casting for a play-making company in Paris that is casting for a new female lead role. The casting director asks Alain to come to the casting agency after he finishes an evening of play making and drink. Inside the agency a young girl has an audition for the female lead in an upcoming play. Alain is invited to audition for the lead role, since Alain already has a successful stage career. He is hired for the role. The actress is a little girl he played in earlier in his career. On the stage Alain is very successful and wins a role in a French film. At the end of shooting he finds out that Alain is the daughter of director Henri Chomet, and she is furious to find out about Alain's success after leaving Hollywood and return back to France to continue his theatrical career instead of making her dreams come true.

Awards and nominations

Tumor necrosis factor superfamily-related activation protein (TRAF)-interacting protein (TRAIP) has a putative TRAF-like domain.
The cytoplasmic TRAF-activated proteins (TAPs) are type I transmembrane proteins with N-terminal death domains (DD) and putative serine/threonine-rich regions (SRR). This is a family of proteins known to co-cluster with tumor necrosis factor receptor-associated factor-1 (TRAF-1)/TRAF-2 and are believed to contribute to the downstream signal transduction mediated by TNF receptors and by members of the NIK/TBK pathways. We identified a novel protein, TRAIP (TNF-receptor-associated factor-interacting protein), in a yeast two hybrid screen that interacted with TRAFS. TRAIP contains an N-terminal DD, followed by a potential serine/threonine-rich and proline-rich-rich region and a C-terminal domain consisting of two ubiquitin-like modules. The C-terminal region was required for TRAIP interaction with TRAF-interacting protein 2 and TRAIP may function as a negative regulator of the NFkappaB, ERK and JNK/c-Jun pathways by interacting with TRAF-1 and TRAF-2.

Django on Apache on Ubuntu for a quick demo

So for the last few days I have been working with python (on the mac actually) and have created a simple blog app. For some reason I just have trouble getting a django installation onto my osx system with apache (ubuntu 10.04 or something). I have always had a hard time getting this thing to work. But finally, after a lot of work I was able to get apache working with django on mac osx.

I got my apache up running, and pointed it to the right directory, I updated my virtual hosts file, and then finally got the site working. I have the demo site available at www.chrisdeer.com. It’s not much to look at right now, but I have already added a basic blog and categories, etc. I’m going to try and work on the site a bit more. Maybe I will have something to put on the blog soon.

Anyway, this was a long ramble… here are my notes:

This blog post was written on my mac right here in my office.

I used virtualenv and it worked fine.

It’s basically just a bunch of symlinks. I’m going to add a few other parts soon. But yeah. That should do it for now. Thanks for reading.

I have a bash script that tries to run a couple of different programs under different envvars.  However, the programs that I am trying to run only have access to their own environment variables.  I have tried setting the set and export variables without luck.  
In other words:
export BASH_SHELL=/bin/ash
export PS1='[$0]'
export HOME=/home/john/
export PATH=%PATH%;~/bin/
cd /home/john
./script_that_needs_different_env

That doesn't work.  

A:

I don't think that you are setting BASH_SHELL, try
env BASH_SHELL=/usr/bin/bash python script.py
instead of 
export BASH_SHELL=/bin/ash

Also you might want to add your variable PATH to another variable:
export PATH="$PATH:$HOME/bin"

Then:
env PATH=$PATH:$BASH_SHELL:

you want to set PATH to your BASH_SHELL and change to an "executable path" that points into your /home/john/ directory

“Are you worried about buying your next home?” That’s a common question that we’ve received from many of our homeowners in our free home buying tips email updates. To answer these questions, we decided to come up with an easy-to-understand article on buying a home!

What is Homebuying Process?

Buying a home can be difficult and time consuming, especially if you didn’t prepare carefully before. A home purchase is like a roller coaster. You have a goal, a date, and a mortgage, right? And then you realize that purchasing a home is an endless process until you close your escrow.

First, you have to understand what is actually included in the process- so that you can budget for it.

What is the home buying process?

After deciding on a location, you will start the search process. Search for your house within the neighborhood and area you want to live in.

This decision will include a lot of research on the condition and value of the houses. You will also look at the neighborhood to study the market situation and what it takes to buy a house in that area.

Once you decide that you will buy the target house, you need to gather the information about the home and its neighborhood. For example, you can find:

A lot of information on the property, including: the property’s size, features, and location. You’ll also look at information about the neighborhood, such as the history of it, nearby schools, community events, services and amenities.

Price Range

You want to come up with a price range, and then you can start narrowing down the number of houses you’re interested in.

Usually, your budget includes:

The down payment on the house

Homeowners’ insurance

Loan fees

Property taxes

Closing costs

How to use a service that requires two different versions of the same dependency

I have written a service that uses the Play2.0's akka-stream-jdbc library.
That library was made with Java 8.
To make the service work, I included this dependency also in the service (as mentioned here https://github.com/Netflix/kamon/issues/902).
The problem now is that Akka is using Java 8 by default with Scala and Play is using Java 7. When the service runs with Play, it cannot connect to the MySQL database.

java.lang.NoSuchMethodError: akka.util.ByteSizeUnit.compareTo(Ljava/lang/Object;Ljava/lang/Object;)I

Is there any way to get both libraries to work together?
There is no solution in the Play-documentation as of now. (https://www.playframework.com/documentation/2.6.x/ScalaJavaAkka#Scala_JavaAkka_compatibility)

A:

You should define what it means to be compatible between Scala 2.11 and Scala 2.12
First, don't depend on akka-stream-jdbc (which is marked as deprecated). Use the new akka-stream-jdbc.
That akka-jdbc library is only designed for compatibility with Java 8. They only provide the Java 8 Streams API and nothing else.
This being said, akka-stream-jdbc only includes Scala 2.11 APIs. If you intend to use these in a project that depends on a Scala 2.12 compiler then you must use your own version of akka-stream-jdbc that follows the migration guide I wrote. In this case, you'll require more work to be done to have the dependencies migrated from the original akka-stream-jdbc to your upgraded one.
If on the other hand you have an older Scala 2.12-based Play/Akka project with an old version of the original akka-stream-jdbc that doesn't compile in Java 8, you can use this migration guide to upgrade it to Akka's 2.12.0.
Finally, if you really need to work with the original akka-stream-jdbc, this migration guide shows how Akka might help you in migrating to

I know that they can use some kind of hashing algorithm, but I'm a bit unsure of the best way to implement it. 

A:

There are a few alternatives for creating user accounts/signing-up user accounts:

Create a local MySQL database and sign-up users there.
Send an email from a server you own, where on the email you have a link containing a unique identifier for the user and a unique password. When the user clicks on the link, the password is crypted and the user is signed-up to the app.
You could send an email, where the link contains the user's username and password instead of the unique ID and this is what the link opens.

The present disclosure relates to apparatus utilized by orthodontists to form fixed appliances such as brackets to attach to a patient's teeth, tubes to guide wires into the brackets for the subsequent attachment of arch wires thereto, and ligatures for connecting the arch wires to associated bracket.
For a variety of reasons, an orthodontist needs to form a fixed appliance, such as a bracket to mount braces to patients' teeth by bonding the brackets directly to the teeth or indirectly via a ligature, so the orthodontist can apply force to urge teeth gradually to their intended positions through a series of applied movements of the brackets attached to the teeth. The force applied by the orthodontist in each applied movement is progressively increased, allowing the teeth to move toward their intended positions.
As more advanced forms of fixed appliances become available, it may be desired to apply different force at particular sites on a tooth to urge it in toward its proper position. For example, in the case of a bracket mounted to a tooth via a tie wing, the orthodontist may wish to apply different forces at a tooth apex and tie wing tip, so the orthodontist can use ligatures to assist in properly positioning the tooth in its intended location. In the case of a bracket mounted to a tooth via a bracket arm, the orthodontist may wish to apply different forces at the attachment of the bracket arm to the tooth, and at a tip of the bracket arm, again to assist in properly positioning the tooth.
Apparatus that can readily and quickly mount brackets according to a variety of positioning scenarios may be desired by orthodontists.

Cortisol awakening response in major depressive disorder: effects of illness chronicity and treatment with bupropion.
Increased amplitude of the cortisol awakening response (CAR) reflects cortisol hyperactivity, and may serve as a biomarker that tracks the course of illness and treatment. In the present study, we examined whether severity of depression and treatment with bupropion affect CAR in a large sample of depressed outpatients. Cortisol awakening saliva samples, clinical ratings, and medical and psychosocial histories were obtained from 1,093 depressed outpatients. We found that illness chronicity negatively correlated with CAR. Further, greater severity of depression, antidepressant treatment response, and bupropion treatment predicted lower CAR. Our results are partially consistent with previous reports which report that increased cortisol awakening levels have been associated with depression illness chronicity, and that response to antidepressant pharmacotherapies is reflected by CAR. These findings point to important differences in the CAR of the acutely depressed patient from the CAR of the chronically depressed patient.

Bagel-making, at least to me, is about a whole different element of life: the relationship between the dough, and the glaze. I mean, do you ever get into a disagreement with your dough? Do you ever get in a tiff with the dough? I wouldn't want to lose too much dough to a dispute. No, I wouldn't want to lose any dough, much less any money. There's, at least to me, a big difference between a dispute of dough and a dispute of anything else. You know, you might get into a disagreement with your wife, or your girlfriend, or your brother. But, as for dough, that's a little bit different.

We're all familiar with a debate between our wife and our friend, the same friend we're sure she loves. We see the argument between their spouses. We witness the argument between their kids. We see the two of you arguing over the bill because you ordered something the other person didn't. But you see, we only see each person on his or her own side of the argument. We never see the other person, the person with whom he (or she) is arguing. Because, as far as you know, your wife is only arguing with you because she loves you and she loves having a debate with you. The same is true with your friend. You believe this because you know your friend loves you enough to argue in your stead.

This is my point with dough. You make it, you bake with it, you eat it, and you love to have a debate with it. It's the same debate that we engage in when we have an argument with your dough, and I hate to lose the dough over the fact that maybe sometimes we should lose it.

So when you make your bagel dough, your initial thought will be something like, well, if it didn't rise to the proper glaze-covered bagel height, then there goes that glaze job, and I'm out that dough. That's why it doesn't really take any more effort or time to make a good bagel bagel than it does to make a good bagel with that good old, traditional plain old, bagel dough. After all, isn't that what we're supposed to be making here: good bagels? Or, I'm really supposed to be making bagel-cookies-and-pies-bought-and-baked-at-BagelLand?

Nano-fabrication involves the fabrication of very small structures, e.g., having features on the order of nanometers or smaller. One area in which nano-fabrication has had a sizeable impact is in the processing of integrated circuits. As the semiconductor processing industry continues to strive for larger production yields while increasing the circuits per unit area formed on a substrate, nano-fabrication becomes increasingly important. Nano-fabrication provides greater process control while allowing increased reduction of the minimum feature dimension of the structures formed. Other areas of development in which nano-fabrication has been employed include biotechnology, optical technology, mechanical systems and the like.
An exemplary nano-fabrication technique is commonly referred as STM (Scanning Tunneling Microscopy). This technique was employed in fabricating the first high-resolution electron microscope in 1981. An STM is based on the phenomenon of tunneling current. When a voltage is applied between a conductive probe and a conductive surface of a sample, electrons can tunnel through a very thin dielectric (insulator) layer. When the distance between the probe and the surface of the sample is reduced to the point where the electrons can tunnel through the dielectric layer, an extremely precise measurement of distance can be made.
Another form of nano fabrication, imprint lithography involves formation of a relief pattern in a polymeric film. The pattern can be referred to as template. After forming a layer, the polymer layer along with the relief pattern can be contacted with a fluid (e.g., alkene and alkane precursor) to transfer the relief pattern to the underlying layer. After the transfer, the polymer can be stripped.

Q:

How to print the first N elements of a pandas csv

I was wondering if there was a simple way to print out the first N elements of a pandas DataFrame without resorting to the below:
new_df = df.iloc[:N]
print new_df.head()

I was hoping there was a way to do this in the.head() method

A:

import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
from collections import deque
df = pd.DataFrame([['1', 'A', 'B'], ['2', 'C', 'D'], ['5', 'G', 'G']], columns=['a', 'b', 'c'])

#deque() has some useful data structures that it uses. 
deque(1, maxlen=6, default=None)

#return first 6 elements and assign to deque
deque_1 = deque(df.shape[0])
df.head(6, drop=False)[:6]

#save to new dataframe
pandas_df = df.set_index('a')
pandas_df = pandas_df.iloc[:deque_1].reset_index()
print pandas_df.head()

Output:
  b   c
a     
1  A  B
5  G  G

A:

pandas.DataFrame.head(10) does the trick. If you don't need your dataframe to be indexed and indexed data is already present in the dataframe you could just do df.iloc[:10] to print all the rows starting with 1 up to 10.

Vaccine Safety

As discussed, there is no scientific evidence that vaccines cause autism or SIDS. Therefore, even though parents are afraid that their child may have autism or SIDS, they should consider all the information available, ask their physician questions, and make informed decisions about vaccines. The medical risks of vaccines are much less than the risks of diseases for which the vaccines are intended.

Parents and other caregivers should keep a watchful eye on the children that receive vaccinations. Parents whose children are having problems after receiving shots should visit their child’s doctor to determine if there are any problems that might be causally related to the shots. The following is a list of some of the most common reactions that occur right after a child receives vaccinations:

Anaphylactic reactions

Injection site reactions

Vomiting and/or diarrhea

Fever and crying spells

Tremors

Hives

Mouth blisters (also known as “sties”)

Sudden, unexplained crying

It is best not to try to give a second dose of a vaccine within 72 hours of the first (this can increase reaction frequency). If a second dose is necessary, make sure that the first dose is given more than 48 hours before the second dose.

Safety and efficacy are the two key ingredients in assuring that vaccination programs are safe for children.
There have been a limited number of studies (often underpowered and of relatively short duration) that have suggested safety and efficacy problems with one or another vaccination.
That does not mean that we cannot or should not vaccinate.
But, if we want to reassure our parents, we need to assure everyone that the vaccine is safe and works reliably.

Vaccine safety in the United States has been studied for approximately the past 50 years by the manufacturer, by the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC), by the Food and Drug Administration (FDA), by the National Institutes of Health (NIH), by the vaccine regulatory agencies in England and Wales and Canada and more recently in numerous studies sponsored by the National Vaccine Injury Compensation Program (NVICP).

Over the years, there have been literally hundreds of published studies of vaccine safety and efficacy, and hundreds of thousands of children have received vaccinations. For this reason, there is an extensive body of clinical and epidemiologic scientific information on vaccine safety and efficacy.

The Texas Facilities Commission announced today that HNTB (HNTB) had been awarded the contract for the Medical Center.

HNTB will provide $3.67 billion worth of construction services with an estimated $400 million being spent on the project overall. All 10 construction trade firms are eligible for the contract awards, but according to a report from the Associated General Contractors of Texas, only 2 companies received the top awards.

Barry Smitherman, president of the Facilities Commission, said this morning that the 10 firms "were invited to bid, and they all competed and bid on the project. After some analysis of the bids, two firms [with] the highest-ranked score... were selected for the award."

"It is a contract, but it's a partnership," Smitherman added. "Both the builder and ourselves [the commission] have to understand that if the project were to be successful, they, the medical center and we as the state of Texas, would benefit for many many years" to come.

The two contractors -- which were chosen from all 10 construction companies -- will receive $400 million for the work on the $8 billion project, for a total compensation of $4 billion. However the state has not yet announced the final award amounts. The facilities commission is expected to have the contract awards finalized later this month.

How to create a single file in a directory listing in bash?

How do I create a single file in a directory listing when using bash?
I've tried:
find / -name '*.php' | xargs -I % touch -v %

It creates a file with a newline character and a space before and after the actual file name.

find / -name '*.php' | xargs -I % touch -v '%'

[Biological activity of an anti-asthmatic heptapeptide substance isolated by protein modification: a possible mechanism of action of the anti-allergic effect of Lom-3 heptapeptide].
It has been shown in earlier studies that Lom-3 heptapeptide (Hep) possesses immunotropic properties and modulates the functions of humoral and cellular immunity and is also able to influence the course of local and systemic allergic reactions. To further examine the mechanisms of the antiallergic action of Lom-3 heptapeptide, we examined immunological effects of the peptide (0.3-3.0 microM) in experiments in vitro (in mixed leukocyte and B cell cultures and an in vivo rat model), determined the role of LOM-3 heptapeptide in T and B cells activation in vitro and assessed the effects of the peptide on the cytokine network in the mixed leukocyte culture of human mononuclear blood cells in vitro in the presence or absence of the peptide. The results obtained demonstrated the ability of the peptide to suppress T and B cells proliferation in a dose-dependent manner. Moreover, the peptide was able to modulate the release of immunoglobulins from B cells, IFN-gamma, IL-4 and IL-5 from stimulated T cells. It is suggested that these effects may be due to modulation of T and B cells activation.

A jet-stream of the fluid strikes the rotating shaft at a region of the circumference of the rotating shaft; the fluid is directed onto the rotating shaft by jet of the stream.
The shaft of a motor vehicle also should be lubricated. Accordingly, it is desirable to provide a method to facilitate application of a lubricant to a surface of a rotating shaft of a motor vehicle.
It is an object of the invention to provide a rotating-shaft-lubricating device that provides for more efficient lubricating of a surface of a rotating shaft of a motor vehicle.
It is a further object of the invention to provide a rotating-shaft-lubricating device that is simple and is not in need of a high manufacturing cost.
It is a further object of the invention to provide a rotating-shaft-lubricating device that is efficient in use during operation of the rotating-shaft-lubricating device on a motor vehicle.
It is another object of the invention to provide a motor-vehicle-rotating-shaft-lubricating device that is able to clean the rotating surface of the rotating shaft.
The foregoing objects of the invention will be understood more readily after a consideration of the accompanying drawings and the following description of the preferred embodiment.

The present invention relates to a novel technique for designing a semiconductor integrated circuit to achieve a specific function by using a plurality of standard cells and a method of designing the same. More particularly, it relates to a method of implementing a specific function which requires only a small number of input or output pins by connecting a plurality of semiconductor circuits, as represented by a large scale integrated circuit (LSI), each designed to perform a specific function with, at minimum, predetermined logic standards (inputs and outputs), by using a plurality of standard cells. The present invention is particularly favorably applicable to a semiconductor integrated circuit which uses a high density integration process employing a fine pattern to achieve high speed and a large-scale integrated circuit (LSI) which is produced on a large scale. In addition, the present invention relates to a technique of designing the same.
2. Description of the Related Art
At present, it is possible to realize any desired function by simply designing a semiconductor integrated circuit as long as a sufficiently large number of transistors are available. It is, however, quite difficult to increase the number of transistors within a semiconductor integrated circuit by using a fine pattern process, and the number of transistors that can be actually used is inevitably limited. In other words, the amount of information that can be processed within a certain period is, in practice, restricted by the number of transistors that can be actually used.
By contrast, the processing speed of semiconductor integrated circuits using a medium pattern process, represented by gate array and the like, can be increased by designing many standard cells, and it is possible to realize devices capable of achieving a higher level of integration. However, it is very difficult to integrate a plurality of semiconductor circuits having different functions on an integrated circuit, and their development also requires long development periods. In addition, even if the number of external terminals is equal to that of the standard cells, the external terminals are not only connected to the standard cells but also to a large number of transistors, for which only design of the standard cells is available, so that the number of external terminals should not be greatly different from that of the standard cells.
In view of such circumstances, it has been desired to develop a technique for developing a semiconductor integrated circuit having a small number of external terminals.

Aquapad

The Aquapad is a portable hydroponic garden, based on the principles of phytotron gardening. It can be carried with one hand (in a small backpack), set up quickly, and requires almost no maintenance. It consists of a flexible mesh bag attached to a weighted base to provide a buoyancy effect which keeps the air in the tank and helps keep the roots dry. It was first developed in 2000 by American inventor James Lecoske (founder of the company Aquaponics), and is used by a number of hydroponic farming enthusiasts in the United States and other countries.

The Aquapad has been used in the following locations as hydroponic garden:
 Stanford University, Palo Alto, California 
 UC Berkeley, Berkeley, California 
 Los Angeles County Jail 
 Green Valley Regional Center (a state-run facility for the mentally-handicapped) 
 UC Berkeley Botanical Gardens 
 High Times Hydroponic Gardens 

In 2009, The Aquapad received the Best New Product of the Year award at the International Water Lettuce Conference.

References

Category:Hydrogen economy

In 2012, an estimated 23,800 new HIV infections occurred among MSM (men who have sex with men) in the United States, an overall decrease of 11.2% since 2010.[26]

What Do We Do Now?

So, how can we move forward in our efforts to save lives? If the science isn’t clear or ambiguous, if it appears one-sided (for example, an ‘up-side-down,’ or right-side-up, study), if it doesn’t make sense to us, that doesn’t mean we can ignore it. The truth, which can sometimes be hard to accept, is more important than our pride. Let’s face it—this is something we want to do differently, and to change our country for the better.

While we cannot be sure, and while the numbers aren’t conclusive, there are many things we can be sure of and act on. While an HIV outbreak is not likely within our lifetime, a public health outbreak is within our lifetime. The HIV response is one we’ve already been through before; as we do with all public health issues (Hepatitis C, Zika, Lyme, Ebola) we have, collectively, already made it clear what we must do to protect and save lives. This includes knowing how to protect and save them as each outbreak unfolds, so that we are able to respond successfully as they unfold. HIV is, and has been, preventable and it still is. It’s a disease of today, not a disease for the future.

All of this can be put into action by:

knowing the facts, the science

knowing the law

knowing HIV/STI prevention

knowing where and how to access a test and link to care if needed

knowing who is at risk and where they are at risk

knowing how to be a good role model

being open and honest with everyone you know

knowing how to avoid infection

understanding what can be done to stop this disease in other places, and how that information applies to our home

Doing the right thing, knowing the right thing, taking the right thing for the right reasons
